src: 在完成设备的位置线后，将根据现场设备位置线，采用经纬仪或水准仪检测安装平面的平整度，安装平面的的平整度必须达到土建图纸要求后方可施工，以确保设备安装公差符合招标文件要求。
mt: After the position line of the equipment is completed, the flatness of the installation plane will be detected by theodolite or level gauge according to the position line of the site equipment. The construction can only be carried out after the flatness of the installation plane meets the requirements of the civil engineering drawings to ensure that the installation tolerance of the equipment meets the requirements of the bidding documents.
pe: After the position line of the equipment is completed, the flatness of the installation plane will be detected by a theodolite or level gauge according to the position line of the site equipment. The construction shall not be carried out until the flatness of the installation plane meets the requirements of the civil engineering drawings to ensure that the installation tolerance of the equipment meets the requirements of the tender documents.

pe: During the installation of the baggage handling system equipment, the assembly, hoisting position and orientation of the single equipment of each baggage handling system shall be determined according to the Plan Process Layout of System Equipment and the actual condition of the construction site.

src: 童根兴对华北乡村“ 家户工”的研究，揭示出当流动农民工被吸纳到深嵌于地方村落的“家户工厂”后，这种乡土性工厂政体通过双重作用锻造出一种“非典型劳工”（童根兴，2005）。
mt: The study of "household workers" in North China's rural areas by Tong Genxing reveals that when migrant migrant workers are taken into "household factories" embedded in local villages, such local factory politics forged a kind of "atypical labor" through double action (Tong Genxing, 2005).
pe: The study of "household workers" in North China's rural areas by Tong Genxing reveals that when migrant workers are taken into "household factories" located in local villages, such local factory regime forges a kind of "atypical labor" through double action (Tong Genxing, 2005).

src: 农民工频繁的抗争无不导源于与这个“农民工生产体制”的冲突（参见郭于华等，2011；沈原主编，2013）。
mt: The frequent struggle of migrant workers is inevitably caused by the conflict with this "migrant workers production system" (see Guo Yuhua et al., 2011; edited by Shen Yuan, 2013).
pe: The frequent struggle of migrant workers is inevitably caused by the conflict with the "migrant workers' production system" (See Guo Yuhua et al., 2011; Edited by Shen Yuan, 2013).

src: 负责设计变更相关工程变更（ECR）的提出、实现、评审、协调和研究工作；

pe: Be responsible for proposing, implementing, reviewing, coordinating and investigating the Engineering Change Request (ECR) related to design changes;

src: 参与生产和过程变更相关的工程变更（ECR）的评审，评估工程变更对产品的影响，负责试剂变更的研究及相关验证和确认活动；
mt: Participate in the review of engineering changes (ECR) related to production and process changes, evaluate the impact of engineering changes on products, and be responsible for the research of reagent changes and relevant verification and confirmation activities;
pe: Participate in the review of the Engineering Change Request (ECR) related to production and process changes, evaluate the impact of engineering changes on products, and be responsible for the investigation of reagent changes and relevant verification and validation activities;

src: 负责工程变更所涉及的开发文档的编写和审核，如设计更改说明、验证方案和验证报告等，确保开发文档的齐套；
mt: Be responsible for the preparation and review of development documents involved in engineering changes, such as design change instructions, verification schemes and verification reports, to ensure the completeness of development documents;
pe: Be responsible for the preparation and review of development documents involved in engineering changes, such as design change instructions, verification protocol and verification reports, so as to ensure complete development documents;

src: 参与转产阶段产品变更相关的评审；

pe: Participate in the review of product changes at the conversion stage;

src: 负责转产阶段产品变更受影响的工艺文件、记录等文档的编写或更新；
mt: Be responsible for the preparation or updating of process documents, records and other documents affected by product changes in the production transfer stage;
pe: Be responsible for the preparation or updating of process documents, records and other documents affected by product changes at the conversion stage;

src: 涉及产品生产工艺变更的，组织进行工艺验证；

pe: Organize the process verification if the product manufacturing process changes;

src: 本系统是针对DRI甲烷水蒸气重整制氢工艺气进行气体组分浓度自动监测而设计的，它能够自动完成样气的多级处理过程，使分析仪器可以得到尽可能干净的样气，确保其能够工作得更加长久；系统可以自动分析样气浓度，监测的数据能够以4～20mA DC的形式输出到相应的二次仪表中，供控制室显示或控制；本系统具有除尘、除水、校表等功能，并且能够自动完成取样、提速、反吹、排水等功能。
mt: The system is designed for automatic monitoring of gas component concentration of DRI methane water vapor reforming hydrogen production process gas. It can automatically complete the multi-stage treatment process of sample gas, so that the analyzer can obtain the sample gas as clean as possible and ensure that it can work longer; the system can automatically analyze the concentration of sample gas, and the monitored data can be output to the corresponding secondary instrument in the form of 4 ~ 20mA DC for display or control in the control room; the system has the functions of dust removal, water removal and surface calibration, and can automatically complete the functions of sampling, speed-up, back blowing and drainage.
pe: The system is designed for automatic monitoring of gas component concentration of DRI methane water vapor reforming hydrogen production process gas. It can automatically complete the multi-stage treatment process of sample gas, so that the analyzer can obtain the sample gas as clean as possible and ensure that it can work longer; the system can automatically analyze the concentration of sample gas, and the monitored data can be output to the corresponding secondary instrument in the form of 4 ~ 20mA DC for display or control in the control room; the system has the functions of dust removal, water removal and surface calibration, and can automatically complete the functions of sampling, speed-up, backflushing and drainage.

src: 有关激光气体分析的内容，请参见相关气体分析仪用户手册或垂询客户服务部（拨打客服热线）。
mt: For laser gas analysis, refer to the relevant gas analyzer user manual or call Customer Service (call Customer Service Hotline).

src: DRI甲烷水蒸气重整制氢分析系统由取样探头单元、探头反吹单元、预处理单元和仪表单元等组成，其中预处理单元和仪表单元集成在样品预处理柜中。

src: 三个一级构造单元交汇形成了复杂的构造格局，从而产生密集的活动断裂，导致历史地震频繁。
mt: The intersection of the three primary tectonic units forms a complex tectonic pattern, resulting in dense active faults, resulting in frequent historical earthquakes.
pe: The intersection of the three first-order tectonic units forms a complex tectonic pattern, resulting in frequent active faults, resulting in frequent historical earthquakes.

src: 这些地震有着沿构造单元边界或活动断裂呈带状展布的特点，5级以上地震多数沿着活动断裂带分布。
mt: These earthquakes are characterized by banded distribution along the boundary of tectonic units or active faults, and most of the earthquakes above magnitude 5 are distributed along the active fault zone.
pe: These earthquakes are characterized by zonal distribution along the boundary of tectonic units or active faults, and most of the earthquakes above magnitude 5 are distributed along the active fault zones.

src: 低压电动机均采用铠装电缆进线，配喇叭口式防爆密封夹紧接头，防爆等级不低于电动机防爆等级。
mt: All LV motors shall be of armored cable incoming line, equipped with flared explosion-proof sealing clamping joints, and the explosion-proof grade shall not be lower than the explosion-proof grade of the motor.
pe: All low-voltage motors shall have armored cable incoming line, equipped with flared explosion-proof sealing clamping joints, and the explosion-proof rating shall not be lower than the explosion-proof rating of the motor.

src: 受青藏高原挤压影响，青海及甘南地区逆断层和走滑断层较为发育，且展布方向大多数为北西、北北西向。
mt: Affected by the compression of Qinghai-Tibet Plateau, the reverse faults and strike-slip faults in Qinghai and Gannan are relatively developed, and most of the distribution directions are NW and NW.
pe: Affected by the extrusion of Qinghai-Tibet Plateau, the reverse faults and strike-slip faults in Qinghai and Gannan areas are relatively developed, and most of the distribution directions are NW and NNW.

src: 宁夏省主要受华北陆块之鄂尔多斯地块西缘影响，内部活动断裂多数转为北北西-南北向，多为右旋走滑断层。
mt: Ningxia Province is mainly affected by the western edge of Ordos Block of North China Land Block. Most of the internal active faults are transformed into NW-SN, mostly right-lateral strike-slip faults.
pe: Ningxia Province is mainly affected by the western edge of Ordos Block of North China Landmass. Most of the internal active faults are transformed into NNW-SN, mostly right-lateral strike-slip faults.

src: 黄河发源于青藏高原，跨越九省区，沿途融纳了40多天主要支流和上千条溪川。
mt: The Yellow River originates from the Qinghai-Tibet Plateau and crosses nine provinces and regions. It has absorbed more than 40 days of main tributaries and thousands of streams and rivers along the route.
pe: The Yellow River originates from Qinghai-Tibet Plateau and flows through nine provinces and regions. It has absorbed more than 40 main tributaries and thousands of streams and rivers along the route.

src: 黄河在5464km的河段上蕴藏着可开发的水电资源达3342.96万kw。
mt: The Yellow River has 33,429,600 kw of exploitable hydropower resources in the 5464km river reach.
pe: The Yellow River has 33,429,600 kw of exploitable hydropower resources in the 5,464 km river reach.

src: 电动机应按照负载需求，由电动机厂家提出配套轴承安装方式，确保满足电动机轴承的使用寿命。
mt: The motor manufacturer shall propose the supporting bearing installation method according to the load requirements to ensure that the service life of the motor bearing is met.
pe: The motor manufacturer shall propose the bearing installation method according to the load requirements to ensure that the service life of the motor bearings is met.

src: 火灾时水流指示器向消防控制室报警并指示火灾区域，同时湿式报警阀压力开关动作，向火灾报警控制器报警，消防联动控制器自动启动消防泵房内自动喷淋泵。
mt: In case of a fire, the water flow indicator will give an alarm to the fire control room and indicate the fire area. At the same time, the pressure switch of the wet alarm valve will act to give an alarm to the fire alarm controller. The fire linkage controller will automatically start the automatic spray pump in the fire pump room.
pe: In case of a fire, the water flow indicator will send an alarm to the fire control room and indicate the fire area. At the same time, the pressure switch of the wet alarm valve will act to give an alarm to the fire alarm controller. The fire fighting linkage control system will automatically start the automatic spray pump in the fire pump room.

src: 90kw及以上的电动机前后轴承应设置一个PT100双支铂热电阻，共2只，带就地显示仪表；电动机定子设置3个PT100双支铂热电阻，带就地显示温度。

pe: Each of the front and rear bearings of 90kw and above motors shall be provided with one PT100 dual platinum thermal resistor, 2 in total, with local display instruments; the motor stator shall be provided with 3 PT100 dual platinum thermal resistors, with local temperature display.

The freezing water pipe is laid to each single building (if necessary) through pipe rack to meet all cooling loads required for air conditioning and process cooling.

src: 兰州市为甘肃省省会，位于甘肃省中部，是我国西部地区重要的中心城市，地处我国重要的经济发展轴线和交通发展轴线的融合点，是我国东中部地区联系大西北的纽带，是西部大开发的前沿和“桥头堡”，是通往新疆、青海、西藏的“门户”和“中转站”，是全国九大综合性交通枢纽之一，是大西北铁路、公路、航空的综合交通枢纽和物流中心。
mt: Lanzhou City is the capital of Gansu Province and is located in the middle of Gansu Province. It is an important central city in western China. It is located at the integration point of the important economic development axis and traffic development axis of China. It is the link between eastern and central China and the Greater Northwest China, the frontier and "bridgehead" of the Western Development, and the "gateway" and "transfer station" to Xinjiang, Qinghai and Tibet. It is one of the nine comprehensive transportation hubs and aviation transportation hubs in China.
pe: Lanzhou City is the capital of Gansu Province and is located in the middle of Gansu Province. It is an important central city in western China. It is located at the integration point of the important economic development axis and traffic development axis of China. It is the link between eastern and central China and the Greater Northwest China, the frontier and "bridgehead" of the Western Development, and the "gateway" and "transfer station" to Xinjiang, Qinghai and Tibet. It is one of the nine comprehensive transportation hubs in China and a comprehensive transportation hub and logistics center for railways, highways, and airlines in Northwest China.

src: 兰州市现辖城关、七里河、西固、安宁、红古5个区和永登、榆中、皋兰3个县，市域面积13086km2；其中中心城区面积688.9km2；2011年兰州市常住人口361.6万人。
mt: Lanzhou City now has 5 districts, namely Chengguan, Qilihe, Xigu, Anning and Honggu, and 3 counties, i.e. Yongdeng, Yuzhong, and Yanlan, with an urban area of 13,086 km2, including a central urban area of 688.9 km2. In 2011, Lanzhou City had a permanent resident population of 3.616 million.
pe: Lanzhou City now has 5 districts: Chengguan, Qilihe, Xigu, Anning, and Honggu, and 3 counties: Yongdeng, Yuzhong, and Yanlan, with an urban area of 13,086 km2, including a central urban area of 688.9 km2. In 2011, Lanzhou City had a permanent resident population of 3.616 million.

src: （3）专项技能培训，培训对象为作业人员，主要针对作业指导书及技术交底进行培训，提高作业人员业务水平，加强对质量的控制。

src: 供方扭矩紧固控制工艺差异，造成备螺母扭矩不足：连接叉打厌氧胶，胶体未完全固化，紧固备螺母时连接叉存在松动回退情况，造成平面压紧形式的扭矩不足
mt: The supplier's torque tightening control process is different, resulting in insufficient torque of the spare nut: The connecting fork is applied with anaerobic adhesive, and the colloid is not fully cured. When the spare nut is tightened, the connecting fork is loose and retreated, resulting in insufficient torque in the form of plane pressing
pe: The supplier's torque tightening control process is different, resulting in insufficient torque of the spare nut: The connecting fork is applied with anaerobic adhesive, but the colloid is not fully cured. src: 本项目配置一套AGC/AVC系统，有功功率控制系统用于功率调节；无功电压控制系统自动调节其发出(或吸收)的无功功率，控制并网点电压在正常运行范围内。

src: 本工程为地面光伏电站，光伏阵列支架的基础，是保证光伏电站安全、正常运行的重要组成部分，需具备一定强度和刚度，满足承载力与变形的要求。
mt: The Project is a ground PV power station. The foundation of PV array support is an important part to ensure the safe and normal operation of the PV power station. It needs to have a certain strength and rigidity to meet the requirements of bearing capacity and deformation.
pe: The Project is a ground PV power station. The foundation of PV array support is an important part to ensure the safe and normal operation of the PV power station. Therefore, it needs to have certain strength and rigidity to meet the requirements of bearing capacity and deformation.

src: 根据不同的地质条件主要有条形基础、独立基础、微型灌注桩、预制混凝土桩、H型钢桩， 螺旋桩等基础形式。
mt: According to different geological conditions, there are mainly strip foundation, independent foundation, micro cast-in-place pile, precast concrete pile, H-shaped steel pile, spiral pile and other foundation forms.
pe: According to different geological conditions, there are mainly strip foundation, independent foundation, micro cast-in-place pile, precast concrete pile, H-shaped steel pile, screw pile and other foundation forms.

src: 根据光伏发电工程的使用年限和运行特点，结合现场环境条件，在结构安全可靠、满足光伏组件安装使用要求的前提下，综合考虑采用H 型钢桩基础方案。
mt: According to the service life and operation characteristics of the PV power generation project, combined with the site environmental conditions, the H-shaped steel pile foundation scheme is comprehensively considered on the premise of safe and reliable structure and meeting the installation and use requirements of PV modules.
pe: According to the service life and operation characteristics of the PV power generation project, and combining with the site environmental conditions, the H-shaped steel pile foundation scheme can be adopted after comprehensive consideration on the premise of safe and reliable structure and meeting the installation and use requirements of PV modules.

src: 根据本项目整体方案规划，将在供能区建设35kV开关站1座，供光伏电站与储能电站接入； 在生产区将建设35kV降压变电站1座，供带本项目生产区相关负荷，同时新建开关站~降压变双回35kV线路，形成本项目供用电网络系统。

Meanwhile, a double-circuit 35kV line from the switchyard to the step-down substation will be built to form a power supply network system of the Project.

src: 在这一特殊的时代背景下，习近平总书记秉持人类命运共同体理念，将协同治理理论与现代科技运用相结合，创造性地提出“三智”合作倡议，为新时代海关事业的发展指明了方向，为深化国际海关合作，凝聚各国海关共识，维护多边主义，共同应对全球性挑战提供了中国方案。
mt: In this special era, General Secretary Xi Jinping adhered to the concept of a community of shared future for mankind, combined the cooperative governance theory with the application of modern science and technology, creatively proposed the "three-intelligence" cooperation initiative, indicating the direction for the development of customs in the new era, providing China's plan for deepening international customs cooperation, gathering customs consensus among countries, maintaining multilateralism and jointly responding to global challenges.
pe: In this special era, General Secretary Xi Jinping adhered to the concept of a community with a shared future for mankind, combined the cooperative governance theory with the application of modern science and technology, creatively proposed the "Three Smarts" cooperation initiative, indicating the direction for the development of customs in the new era, providing China's plan for deepening international customs cooperation, gathering customs consensus among countries, maintaining multilateralism and jointly responding to global challenges.

src: 3.6.3 桥梁结构安全综合评估方法
mt: 3.6.3 Comprehensive Assessment Method for Bridge Structure Safety
pe: 3.6.3 Comprehensive Evaluation Method for Bridge Structure Safety

src: 在桥梁评估领域，现有的评估规范、评估系统大多是基于中小型桥梁的，采用定级评估方法，围绕结构的外观状态和正常使用性能进行定性的，粗浅的安全评估。
mt: In the field of bridge evaluation, the existing evaluation specifications and evaluation systems are mostly based on small and medium-sized bridges. The graded evaluation method is adopted to carry out qualitative and shallow safety evaluation around the appearance status and normal use performance of the structure.
pe: In the field of bridge evaluation, the existing evaluation specifications and evaluation systems are mostly based on small and medium-sized bridges. The rating evaluation method is adopted to carry out qualitative and rough safety evaluation concerning the appearance status and normal service performance of the structure.

src: 影响大型桥梁健康状态的因素繁多，诸因素之间相互联系、相互影响，同时非结构条件及环境因素对大桥的影响程度远大于对中小型桥梁的影响。
mt: There are many factors that affect the health status of large bridges, and these factors are interconnected and interact with each other. At the same time, the impact of non-structural conditions and environmental factors on the bridge is much greater than the impact on small and medium-sized bridges.
pe: There are many factors that affect the health status of large bridges, and these factors are interconnected and interactional. Meanwhile, the impact of non-structural conditions and environmental factors on the bridge is much greater than the impact on small and medium-sized bridges.

src: 如今评估理论还不够先进、评估体系还不够健全，评估方法不够完善，因此确立大桥的评估体系，评估方法非常困难，需要作进一步的研究。
mt: Nowadays, the evaluation theory is not advanced enough, the evaluation system is not perfect enough, and the evaluation method is not perfect enough. Therefore, it is very difficult to establish the evaluation method of the bridge, and further research is required.
pe: Nowadays, the evaluation theory is not advanced enough, the evaluation system is not perfect enough, and the evaluation method is inadequate. Therefore, it is very difficult to establish the evaluation method and method of the bridge, and further research is required.

src: ◆能够记录病害发展趋势，帮助评估损伤危险程度；

pe: Professional technicians of non-nuclear medicine and PET center, without training, should not carry out the management, transfer and use of radiopharmaceuticals.

src: ◆系统基于“路网级”，对于任意指定的桥梁、部件，都可实现随心所欲“一次配置，永久使用，持续更新”；

pe: ◆ The system is based on the "road network level." For any designated bridge and component, it can realize the "one-time configuration, permanent service and continuous updating" at will;

src: 1）保护生态，做好水土保持工作，实行“三同时”制度，加强对施工人员水土保持的教育管理。
mt: 1) Protect the ecology, do a good job in water and soil conservation, implement the "three simultaneities" system, and strengthen the education and management of water and soil conservation for construction personnel.
pe: 1) Protect the ecology, properly conduct water and soil conservation, implement the "three simultaneities" system, and enhance the education and management of water and soil conservation for construction personnel.

src: （3）成立交通组织管理小组，由项目负责安全的负责人牵头，有关部门具体负责，指定责任心和工作能力强的专人负责具体工作的实施，保证交通组织工作落实到位。
mt: (3) Set up a traffic organization and management team, led by the person in charge of safety of the project, and specifically responsible by relevant departments. Designate a special person with a sense of responsibility and strong working ability to be responsible for the implementation of specific work to ensure the implementation of traffic organization work.
pe: (3) Set up a traffic organization and management team, led by the person in charge of the safety of the project, and specifically responsible by relevant departments. src: 1、切实保障桥梁安全。
mt: 1. Ensure bridge safety.
pe: 1. Effectively ensure bridge safety.

src: 使用智慧巡检养护系统能够高效采集病害并上传，及时处理桥梁损伤，防止桥梁小病发展为大病，同时存储管理桥梁巡检养护数据并进行统计分析，为桥梁管养提供决策依据，确保桥梁运营安全。
mt: The use of intelligent patrol inspection and maintenance system can effectively collect and upload diseases, deal with bridge damage in time, prevent bridge minor diseases from developing into major diseases, and store and manage bridge patrol inspection and maintenance data and make statistical analysis, so as to provide decision-making basis for bridge management and maintenance and ensure bridge operation safety.
pe: The smart patrol inspection and maintenance system can be used to effectively collect and upload diseases, deal with bridge damage in time, prevent bridge minor diseases from developing into major diseases, and store and manage bridge patrol inspection and maintenance data and make statistical analysis, so as to provide decision-making basis for bridge management and maintenance and ensure bridge operation safety.

src: 国家电梯质量监督检验中心（简称和标志均为NETEC)出具的每一份型式试验证书均至少对应一份试验结论为合格的型式试验报告。
mt: Each type test certificate issued by the National Elevator Quality Supervision and Inspection Center (hereinafter referred to as "NETEC") shall at least correspond to one type test report with qualified test conclusion.
pe: Each type test certificate issued by the National Elevator Quality Supervision and Testing Center (hereinafter referred to as "NETEC") should at least correspond to one type test report with qualified test conclusion.

src: NETEC所出具的型式试验证书无“国家电梯质量监督检验中心检验报告专用章”或无签发日期无效。
mt: The type test certificate issued by NETEC is invalid without the "Special Seal for Test Report of National Elevator Quality Supervision and Inspection Center" or the date of issuance.
pe: The type test certificate issued by NETEC shall be invalid without the "Special Seal for Test Report of the National Elevator Quality Supervision and Testing Center" or the date of issuance.

src: 型式试验报告和型式试验证书全文有任何涂改无效，部分复制无效。
mt: Any alteration of the type test report and the full version of the type test certificate is invalid, and partial copy is invalid.
pe: Any alteration of the type test report and type test certificate shall be invalid, and partial copy shall be invalid.

src: 本报告仅对样机（样品）有效，试验申请单位对其所提供样机（样品）和技术资料的真实性负责。
mt: This report is only valid for the prototype (sample), and the test application unit is responsible for the authenticity of the prototype (sample) and technical data provided by it.
pe: The report shall be only valid for the prototype (sample), and the test application unit shall be responsible for the authenticity of the prototype (sample) and technical data provided.

src: 试验申请单位对型式试验结论有异议时，应当在收到本报告之日起15个工作日内向NETEC提出书面意见，逾期视为已认可本报告和 证书。
mt: If the test applicant has any objection to the type test conclusion, it shall submit a written opinion to NETEC within 15 working days from the date of receipt of the report. If it is overdue, it shall be deemed that the report and certificate have been approved.
pe: In case of the test applicant has any objection to the type test conclusion, it shall submit a written opinion to NETEC within 15 working days from the date of receipt of the report, beyond which, it shall be deemed that the report and certificate have been approved.

src: 针对桥梁特点制定标准化电子化的巡检养护流程，不同类型的桥梁对应不同的巡检养护流程，不仅实现了管养的规范化，还能够解决传统巡检中任务上传下达的困难，确保及时处理桥梁病害。
mt: According to the characteristics of bridges, a standardized and electronic inspection and maintenance process is formulated. Different types of bridges correspond to different inspection and maintenance processes, which not only realizes the standardization of management and maintenance, but also solves the difficulties in uploading and issuing tasks in traditional inspection, and ensures the timely treatment of bridge diseases.
pe: According to the characteristics of bridges, a standardized and electronic patrol inspection and maintenance process are stipulated. Different types of bridges correspond to different patrol inspection and maintenance processes, which not only realizes the standardization of management and maintenance, but also solves the difficulties in uploading and issuing tasks in traditional patrol inspection, and ensures the timely treatment of bridge diseases.

src: 以混凝土桥面铺装为例，其典型病害共有桥面积水、桥面纵缝、桥面横缝、桥面防水层老化破坏、桥面铺装坑槽、桥面铺装波浪及车辙、桥面铺装龟裂或破碎。
mt: Taking concrete bridge deck pavement as an example, the typical defects include accumulated water on the bridge deck, longitudinal joints on the bridge deck, transverse joints on the bridge deck, aging and damage of waterproof layer on the bridge deck, pot holes on the bridge deck pavement, waves and ruts on the bridge deck pavement, cracking or crushing of the bridge deck pavement.
pe: Taking concrete bridge deck pavement as an example, the typical diseases include ponding on the bridge deck, longitudinal joints on the bridge deck, transverse joints on the bridge deck, aging and damage of waterproof layer on the bridge deck, pits on the bridge deck pavement, waves and ruts on the bridge deck pavement, cracking or fracture of the bridge deck pavement.

src: 将这些常见病害纳入系统的病害库，巡检时可根据现场巡检情况简单判断后，选择相应的桥梁部位和病害信息，系统便会自动加载病害的类型、描述，同时还可进行拍照，支持照片上标记，便可完成桥梁病害一键录入，省时省力。
mt: These common diseases are included in the disease database of the system. During the patrol inspection, the corresponding bridge parts and disease information can be selected after simple judgment according to the on-site patrol inspection conditions, and the system will automatically load the type and description of the disease. Meanwhile, photos can be taken to support the marking on the photos, so as to complete the one-key entry of bridge diseases, saving time and labor.
pe: These common diseases are included in the disease database of the system. During the patrol inspection, the corresponding bridge parts and disease information can be selected after simple judgment according to the on-site patrol inspection conditions, and the system will automatically load the type and description of diseases. Meanwhile, photos can be taken to support the marking on them, so as to complete the one-button entry of bridge diseases, thus saving time and labor.

src: 对于采集的桥梁全寿命周期，经过统一数据格式，并且经过数据清洗、转换、特征提取等预处理手段，消除数据冗余，填补缺失数据、消除数据噪声后，利用基于深度学习的人工智能技术和数据挖掘算法，分析桥梁病害特点，挖掘桥梁病害趋势及成因，并通过图形化的方式展示出来，为管理者提供高价值信息来源。
mt: For the whole life cycle of the collected bridge, after unified data format, data cleaning, conversion, feature extraction and other pre-processing means, data redundancy is eliminated, missing data is filled and data noise is eliminated, the characteristics of bridge diseases are analyzed by using AI technology and data mining algorithm based on deep learning, bridge disease trends and causes are explored, and displayed graphically to provide high-value information sources for managers.
pe: For the whole life cycle of bridges collected, after unified data format, data cleaning, conversion, feature extraction and other pre-processing means, data redundancy is eliminated, missing data is filled and data noise is eliminated, the characteristics of bridge diseases are analyzed by using deep learning AI technology and data mining algorithm, bridge disease trends and causes are explored, and displayed graphically to provide high-value information sources for managers.

src: 传感器在实桥工作环境下能够长期稳定工作，必须具备温漂小、时漂小、可靠性高的特点。

pe: The sensor can operate stably for a long time under the real bridge working environment, and must have the characteristics of small temperature drift, small time drift and high reliability.

src: 一般而言，传感器的数量越多监测的效果越好。

src: 因此，应进行静动力逆解灵敏度分析以确定传感器的数量和位置，使传感器的布置在有限经费下达到最好的测试效果。
mt: Therefore, a static-dynamic inverse resolution sensitivity analysis should be performed to determine the number and location of sensors so that the sensors can be arranged for the best test results with limited funding.
pe: Therefore, a static-dynamic inverse kinematics sensitivity analysis shall be performed to determine the number and location of sensors so that the sensors can be arranged for the best test results with limited funding.

src: a、定时制，预先设定采样的时刻和采样时间；

src: b、触发制，设置阈值或其它触发条件，结构测点满足触发条件时采样，采样时长可预定或根据事先确定的条件来终止采样；
mt: B. Trigger system: Set threshold or other trigger conditions; when the structural measuring point meets the trigger conditions, take samples; the sampling duration can be preset or terminated according to the predetermined conditions;
pe: b. Trigger system: set threshold or other trigger conditions; take samples when the structural measuring point meets the trigger conditions; the sampling duration can be preset or terminated according to the predetermined conditions;

src: 静态数据反映的是桥梁结构缓慢的变化过程，并且采集的次数较少，所以，对于静态数据，可以完全提交或采用统计方式存储；相对而言，动态监测的数据量远大于静态数据，故重点考虑动态数据的采集与存储。
mt: The static data reflects the slow change process of bridge structure and the number of times of collection is small. Therefore, the static data can be completely submitted or stored in a statistical manner. Relatively speaking, the data volume of dynamic monitoring is much larger than that of static data, so the collection and storage of dynamic data are mainly considered.
pe: The static data reflects the slow change process of bridge structure and the number of acquisition is small. src: 在查阅一些作业指导书后, 注意到一些作业指导书的内容比较少提及指导内容. 管理程序的内容主要包括有关应做什么(WHAT)的内容，而 工作指导文件主要提及有关如何完成工作(HOW)的指导内容。
mt: After consulting some operation instructions, it is noticed that the contents of some operation instructions do not refer to the guidance contents. The contents of the management procedure mainly include the contents about what should be done (WHAT), while the work guidance documents mainly refer to the contents about how to complete the work (HOW).
pe: By consulting some operation instructions, it is noticed that they do not refer to the guidance contents. The management procedure contents mainly include the contents about what should be done (WHAT), while the work guidance documents mainly refer to the contents about how to complete the work (HOW).

src: 建议负责 人根据此原则增强现有工作指导文件的内容。

pe: It is recommended that the responsible person enhance the contents of the existing work guidance documents according to this principle.

src: 《日立电梯（中国）有限公司突发环境事件应急预案》是根据《中 华人民共和国环境保护法》、《国家突发环境事件应急预案》、《企业事 业单位突发环境事件应急预案备案管理办法（试行）》等相关法律法 规和规章及指导性文件的有关规定的。
mt: The Emergency Response Plan for Environmental Emergencies of Hitachi Elevator (China) Co., Ltd. is based on relevant laws, regulations and guidance documents such as the Environmental Protection Law of the People's Republic of China, the National Emergency Response Plan for Environmental Emergencies, and the Administrative Measures for the Filing of Emergency Response Plan for Environmental Emergencies of Enterprises (Trial).
pe: The Emergency Plan for Environmental Emergencies of Hitachi Elevator (China) Co., Ltd. is based on relevant laws, regulations and rules and guidance documents such as the Environmental Protection Law of the People's Republic of China, the National Emergency Plan for Environmental Emergencies, and the Administrative Measures for the Filing of Emergency Plan for Environmental Emergencies of Enterprises and Institutions (Trial).

src: 为贯彻《中华人民共和国突发事件应对法》及其它国家法律、法 规及相关文件的要求，有效防范应对突发环境事件。
mt: In order to implement the Emergency Response Law of the People's Republic of China and the requirements of other national laws, regulations and relevant documents, the emergency response shall be effectively prevented.
pe: In order to implement the Emergency Response Law of the People's Republic of China and the requirements of other national laws, regulations and relevant documents, it is necessary to effectively prevent and deal with environmental emergencies.

src: 保护人员生命安 全，减少单位财产损失，日立电梯（中国）有限公司特组织相关部门 和机构编制《日立电梯（中国）有限公司突发环境事件应急预案》。
mt: To protect the life safety of personnel and reduce the loss of unit property, Hitachi Elevator (China) Co., Ltd. specially organizes relevant departments and organizations to prepare the Emergency Plan for Environmental Emergencies of Hitachi Elevator (China) Co., Ltd.
pe: To protect the life safety of personnel and reduce the enterprise property loss, Hitachi Elevator (China) Co., Ltd. specially organizes relevant departments and organizations to prepare the Emergency Plan for Environmental Emergencies of Hitachi Elevator (China) Co., Ltd.

src: 该预案是日立电梯（中国）有限公司实施应急救援的规范性文件，用 于指导日立电梯（中国）有限公司针对突发环境事件的应急救援行动。

src: 结合之前的分析可知，实验数据集中低寿命的电池主要是因为遭到大倍率充电滥用，导致容量快速衰退，内部析锂严重，电池存在内短路的风险。
mt: Based on the previous analysis, it can be seen that the low-life battery in the experimental data set is mainly caused by large-rate charging abuse, resulting in rapid capacity degradation, serious internal lithium precipitation and risk of internal short circuit of the battery.
pe: Based on the previous analysis, it can be concluded that the batteries with short service life in the experimental data set is mainly caused by high-rate charging abuse, resulting in rapid capacity degradation, serious internal lithium plating and risk of internal short circuit of the battery.

src: 模板参数 (带*号的为必填项)
mt: Template parameters (required items with *)
pe: Template parameters (items with * are compulsory)

src: 投标人应无偿为招标人培训电梯管理和维修人员约15名。
mt: The Tenderer shall train about 15 elevator management and maintenance personnel for the Tenderee free of charge.
pe: The Bidder shall provide training for about 15 elevator management and maintenance personnel for the Bid Inviter free of charge.

src: 基本交路车次转换
mt: Conversion of basic routing trains
pe: Conversion of train numbers from basic routing

src: 通过培训应使受训的招标人人员能够胜任对设备日常修理和维护工作。
mt: Through the training, the trained personnel of the Tenderee shall be competent for the daily repair and maintenance of the equipment.
pe: After the training, the trained personnel of the Bid Inviter shall be competent for the daily repair and maintenance of the equipment.

src: 培训的对象是招标人电梯管理和维修人员人数，约15人。
mt: The training object is the number of elevator management and maintenance personnel of the Tenderee, about 15 persons.
pe: The training object is about 15 elevator management and maintenance personnel.

pe: Gear assembly (gear box) for aircraft engines

src: 投标人应提交培训计划交招标人确认，培训计划应包括：
mt: The Tenderer shall submit the training plan to the Tenderee for confirmation. The training plan shall include:
pe: The Bidder shall submit the training plan for the Bid Inviter for confirmation. The training plan shall include:

src: 培训材料应在培训实施前1个月提交给招标人确认。
mt: The training materials shall be submitted to the Tenderee for confirmation 1 month before the training is implemented.
pe: The training materials shall be submitted to the Bid Inviter for confirmation 1 month before the training is provided.

src: 所有培训用材料应易拷贝，音像制品应能拷贝复制，文件应同时提供2份电子拷贝。
mt: All training materials shall be easy to copy, audio and video products shall be able to copy, and the documents shall be provided with 2 electronic copies at the same time.
pe: All training materials shall be easy to copy, audio and video products shall be able to be copied, and the documents shall be provided with 2 electronic copies at the same time.

src: 为达到培训目的，投标人的培训计划建议表中应包括但不限于下列条款中的内容。
mt: For the purpose of training, the Tenderer's Training Plan Proposal Form shall include but not limited to the following items.
pe: For the purpose of training, the Bidder's training plan proposal form shall include but not limited to the following items.

src: 故障检测:各类故障识别、分析及排除。
mt: Fault detection: Identification, analysis and elimination of various faults.
pe: Fault detection: Identification, analysis and troubleshooting of various faults.

src: 应使未来的设备维护人员获得如何维护各种设备的知识和技术。
mt: Future equipment maintenance personnel should be provided with knowledge and technology on how to maintain various equipment.
pe: Future equipment maintenance personnel should have the knowledge and technology on how to maintain various equipment.

src: 投标人应在投标文件中提供详细的培训计划建议，该计划应包括培训的地点、课程安排、各科目课时、教员和模拟设施。
mt: The Tenderer shall provide detailed training plan suggestions in the Tender Document, which shall include training place, course arrangement, class hours of each subject, instructor and simulation facilities.
pe: The Bidder shall provide detailed training plan suggestions in the Bid Document, which shall include training place, course arrangement, class hours of each subject, instructor and simulation facilities.

src: 投标人应在各项培训开始前至少30天向招标人提供学员所需数量的教材。
mt: The Tenderer shall provide the Tenderee with the required amount of teaching materials at least 30 days before the commencement of each training.
pe: The Bidder shall provide the Bid Inviter with the required number of teaching materials at least 30 days before the commencement of each training.

src: 回灌处理裝置
mt: Irrigation treatment placement
pe: Injection treatment plant

src: 培训效果的考核
mt: Assessment of training effectiveness
pe: Assessment of training effect

src: 为使培训人员不断进步而达到培训计划要求，所有培训人员都应经常接受测验和考试，取得进展和足够的培训，并且在培训结束时通过理论以及实操考核，达到能够处理一般日常故障维修的水平。
mt: In order to make the trainees continuously improve and meet the requirements of the training plan, all trainees shall frequently receive tests and examinations to achieve progress and sufficient training, and pass the theoretical and practical examination at the end of the training to reach the level that can handle general daily fault maintenance.
pe: To make the trainees make continuous improvements and meet the requirements of the training plan, all trainees shall frequently receive tests and examinations to achieve progress and sufficient training, and pass the theoretical and practical examination at the end of the training to reach the level that can handle general daily breakdown maintenance.

src: 投标人应准备并提交一份测验和考试计划，以及详细材料，包括范围、功能和方法，供招标人批准，并邀请招标人管理人员参与培训考核工作。
mt: The Tenderer shall prepare and submit a test and examination plan and detailed materials, including scope, functions and methods, for the Tenderee's approval, and invite the Tenderee's management personnel to participate in the training and examination.
pe: The Bidder shall prepare and submit a test and examination plan and detailed materials, including scope, functions and methods, for the Bid Inviter's approval, and invite the Bid Inviter's management personnel to participate in the training and examination.

src: 投标人应负责测验和考试的所有安排和费用。
mt: The Tenderer shall be responsible for all arrangements and costs for tests and examinations.
pe: The Bidder shall be responsible for all arrangements and costs for tests and examinations.

src: 对成功地完成培训的学员应颁发证书。
mt: Trainees who have successfully completed the training shall be certified.
pe: Trainees who have successfully passed the training shall be certified.

src: 投标人责任
mt: Bidder's Responsibility
pe: Bidder's responsibilities

src: 投标人的任教人员应是经验丰富的工程师或技师。
mt: The trainers of the Tenderer shall be experienced engineers or technicians.
pe: The trainers of the Bidder shall be experienced engineers or technicians.

src: 投标人应提供教材。
mt: The Tenderer shall provide educational materials.
pe: The Bidder shall provide teaching materials.

src: 项目管理及责任
mt: Project management and responsibilities
pe: Project Management and Responsibilities

src: 本节适用于招标人对投标人在工程实施阶段的管理办法。
mt: This section is applicable to the management measures of the Tenderee for the Tenderer in the project implementation stage.
pe: This section is applicable to the management measures of the Bid Inviter for the Bidder in the project implementation stage.

src: 招标人对电梯与土建设计有关的一些结构参数作了规定或限制，供货商对产品的设计，应符合附图的要求。
mt: The Tenderee has specified or limited some structural parameters related to the civil design of the elevator. The supplier's design of the product shall meet the requirements of the attached drawings.
pe: The Bid Inviter has specified or limited some structural parameters of the elevator related to civil design. The supplier's design of the product shall meet the requirements of the attached drawings.

src: 2018年度财务决算专项说明的审核报告
mt: Audit Report on Special Description of Financial Final Account in 2018
pe: Audit Report on Special Description of Financial Statement in 2018

src: 1.2设计工作开展程序
mt: 1.2 Design Work Development Procedure
pe: 1.2Development procedures of design

src: 投标人在接到中标通知10天内，向招标人提交符合附图要求的本合同型号电梯的主要结构参数图。
mt: Within 10 days after receiving the notice of award, the Tenderer shall submit to the Tenderee the main structural parameter diagram of the elevator of the contract model that meets the requirements of the attached drawings.
pe: Within 10 days after receiving the notice of award, the Bidder shall submit to the Bid Inviter the main structural parameter diagram of the elevator of the contract model that meets the requirements of the attached drawings.

src: 投标人应在设计联络后30天内完成设计修改，并按规定将图纸一式5份提交招标人认可。
mt: The Tenderer shall complete the design modification within 30 days after the design liaison, and submit the drawings in quintuplicate to the Tenderee for approval as required.
pe: The Bidder shall complete the design modification within 30 days after the design liaison, and submit the drawings in quintuplicate to the Bid Inviter for approval as required.

src: 投标人应对合同设备制造、安装全过程制订质保计划，作为附件纳入投标文件。
mt: The Tenderer shall formulate a quality assurance plan for the whole process of contract equipment manufacturing and installation, which shall be included in the Tender Document as an attachment.
pe: The Bidder shall formulate a quality assurance plan for the whole process of contract equipment manufacturing and installation, which shall be included in the Bid Documents as an attachment.

src: 货物到达现场后，在招标人有防雨水措施的条件下，投标人所采用的包装能使零件不会发生锈蚀。
mt: After the goods arrive at the site, under the condition that the Tenderee has rainproof measures, the packaging adopted by the Tenderer can prevent the parts from rusting.
pe: After the goods arrive at the site, under the condition that the Bid Inviter has rainproof measures, the packages used by the Bidder can prevent the parts from rusting.

src: 这套装箱单应作防水处理后可靠地固定在箱侧上。
mt: This set of packing list shall be reliably fixed on the box side after waterproof treatment.
pe: This set of packing list shall be reliably fixed on the box side after waterproofing treatment.

src: 图纸和技术文件内容见第八章第2条。
mt: The contents of drawings and technical documents are shown in Chapter 8, Article 2.
pe: The contents of drawings and technical documents are shown in paragraph 2 of Chapter 8.

src: 发货必须以台为单位，每台电梯的全部零部件必须一次发货（包括随机附件和专用工具）。
mt: Delivery must be in sets, and all parts of each elevator must be delivered at one time (including accompanying accessories and special tools).
pe: Delivery must be made in sets, and all parts of each elevator must be delivered at one time (including accompanying accessories and special tools).

src: 对招标人已发出“供货通知书”的电梯，投标人还必须根据各车站的实际工程进度发货，投标人的项目负责人应参加与电梯有关的工程协调会，以决定最合理的发货时间。
mt: For the elevators that have been issued with "supply notice" by the Tenderee, the Tenderer must also deliver according to the actual project progress of each station. The Tenderer's project leader shall participate in the project coordination meeting related to elevators to determine the most reasonable delivery time.
pe: For the elevators whose "supply notice" has been issued by the Bid Inviter, the Bidder must also deliver according to the actual project progress of each station. The Bidder's project leader shall participate in the project coordination meeting related to elevators to determine the most reasonable delivery time.

src: 投标人负责到安装现场过程中的全部运输，包括运输过程中的中转（外地厂家需采用不同运输方式运输时）。
mt: The Tenderer shall be responsible for all transportation to the installation site, including transit during transportation (when the foreign manufacturers need to adopt different transportation modes).
pe: The Bidder shall be responsible for all transportation to the installation site, including the transit during transportation (when the non-local manufacturers need to adopt different transportation modes).

src: 外省单位必须在兰州设有室内中转库存点，可用以存放不少于5台不能直接进入安装现场的电梯。
mt: Foreign units must have indoor transfer stock points in Lanzhou, which can be used to store at least 5 elevators that cannot directly enter the installation site.
pe: Non-local organizations must have indoor transit storage points in Lanzhou, which can be used to store at least 5 elevators that cannot directly enter the installation site.

src: 如果是后者投标人应和地铁工程运输管理部门联系（需收取费用）。
mt: In the case of the latter, the Tenderer shall contact the Metro Engineering Transport Management Department (at a fee).
pe: In the case of the latter, the Bidder shall contact the Metro Engineering Transport Management Department (charge is required).

src: 存放点由招标人现场圈定。
mt: The storage place shall be determined by the Tenderee on site.
pe: The storage place shall be determined by the Bid Inviter on site.

src: 安装人员应是电梯专业技工，持有政府部门的上岗证。
mt: The installation personnel shall be professional elevator technicians and hold the work license of government departments.
pe: The installation personnel shall be professional elevator technicians and hold the work license issued by government departments.

src: 投标人应设有安装负责人，负责安装工程的计划、协调、人力调配及工程质量管理等工作，还应设安装现场工程师负责技术指导，质量监督、安装现场测量，安装质量记录检查认可等。
mt: The Tenderer shall set up an installation director to be responsible for the planning, coordination, manpower allocation and project quality management of the installation works, and shall also set up an installation site engineer to be responsible for technical guidance, quality supervision, installation site measurement, inspection and approval of installation quality records, etc.
pe: The Bidder shall have an installation director to be responsible for the planning, coordination, manpower allocation and project quality management of the installation works, and shall also have an installation site engineer to be responsible for technical guidance, quality supervision, installation site measurement, inspection and approval of installation quality records, etc.

src: 投标人应具备同时开展5个站的安装，每月至少完成5台以上电梯安装的能力。
mt: The Tenderer shall be able to carry out the installation of 5 stations at the same time, and complete the installation of at least 5 elevators every month.
pe: The Bidder shall be able to install 5 stations at the same time, and complete the installation of at least 5 elevators every month.

src: 并应在投标文件中介绍人力配备和安装能力。
mt: The manpower allocation and installation capacity shall be introduced in the bidding documents.
pe: The manpower allocation and installation capacity shall be described in the Bid Documents.

src: 投标人应参加每个车站的土建施工检验工作，对每台电梯的安装现场进行检查，确认土建结构是否符合要求。
mt: The Tenderer shall participate in the civil construction inspection of each station, inspect the installation site of each elevator, and confirm whether the civil structure meets the requirements.
pe: The Bidder shall participate in the civil construction inspection of each station, inspect the installation site of each elevator, and confirm whether the civil structure meets the requirements.

src: 如不符合要求及时将测量结果知会招标人及土建承包商，同时做好进一步跟踪土建整改情况。
mt: If it does not meet the requirements, the measurement results shall be reported to the Tenderee and the civil contractor in time, and the rectification of civil works shall be further tracked.
pe: If the requirements are not met, the measurement results shall be reported to theBid Inviter and the civil construction contractor in time, and the rectification of civil works shall be further tracked.

src: 若电梯井道安装前后有积水、渗水，投标人负责清理。
mt: The Tenderer shall be responsible for cleaning the accumulated water and water seepage before and after the installation of the elevator shaft.
pe: The Bidder shall be responsible for cleaning the accumulated water and water seepage before and after the installation of the elevator shaft.

src: 安装开始前15天，投标人应约招标人共同检查安装现场是否已具备。
mt: 15 days before installation, the Tenderer shall ask the Tenderee to jointly check whether the installation site is available.
pe: 15 days before the commencement of installation, the Bidder shall ask the Bid Inviter to jointly check whether the installation site is available,

src: 包括临时用电用水和临时用房的搭建地点的确定。
mt: Including the determination of temporary power supply and temporary building location.
pe: including the determination of temporary electricity, water and temporary housing construction site.

pe: Scope of installation work

src: 安装工作包括设备吊装，井道搭棚在内的全部现场作业。
mt: Installation work includes all on-site operations such as equipment hoisting and shaft erection.
pe: Installation work includes all on-site operations such as equipment hoisting and scaffold erecting in shafts.

src: 光伏硅片的尺寸演化需要考虑两方面因素：一方面是硅片尺寸变化对产业链制造成本的影响；另一方面是从组件应用的角度考量硅片尺寸对组件尺寸、电参数及组件在系统端应用的影响。
mt: Two factors need to be considered for the dimensional evolution of PV silicon wafers: On the one hand, the influence of silicon wafer size change on the manufacturing cost of the industrial chain; on the other hand, the influence of silicon wafer size on module size, electrical parameters and module application at the system end is considered from the perspective of module application.
pe: Two factors need to be considered for the evolution of PV silicon wafer size: On the one hand, the influence of silicon wafer size change on the manufacturing cost of the industrial chain; on the other hand, from the perspective of module application, the influence of silicon wafer size on module size, electrical parameters and module application at the system end.

src: 苯、甲苯、二甲苯储罐安装呼吸废气处理设施，采用冷凝、吸附、吸收、燃烧等可行技术或组合工艺技术，确保尾气达标排放。

src: 主要处理废气为石脑油、污油、汽油、苯、二甲苯、苯乙烯、甲醇、裂解汽油、C8等储罐的大、小呼吸排放废气。

pe: Vehicles and ships with oil and gas recovery interfaces shall be used for the transportation of relevant products.

src: 装车过程中产生的VOCs通过油气收集总管经过压缩机增压后进入吸收塔，经过吸收液吸收掉一部分有机物后，进入膜分离单元，经过膜分离后，油气浓度基本上已接近排放标准，最后从膜分离出来的油气进入吸附塔吸附后排至大气。
mt: The VOCs generated in the loading process enter the absorption tower after being pressurized by the oil-gas collection header through the compressor, and enter the membrane separation unit after absorbing some organic matters by the absorption liquid. After membrane separation, the oil-gas concentration basically approaches the emission standard, and finally the oil-gas separated from the membrane enters the adsorption tower for adsorption and then is discharged to the atmosphere.
pe: The VOCs generated during the loading enter the absorption tower after being boosted by the oil-gas collection header through the compressor, and enter the membrane separation unit after absorption of some organic matters by the absorption liquid. After membrane separation, the oil-gas concentration basically approaches the emission standard, and finally the oil-gas separated from the membrane enters the adsorption tower for adsorption and then is discharged to the atmosphere.

src: 压缩机入口设置低压报警及低低压连锁停机。

src: 用于集输、储存和处理含挥发性有机物、恶臭物质的废水设施予以密闭，产生废气接入有机废气处理设施。
mt: The wastewater facilities used for gathering, storage and treatment of volatile organic compounds and odorous substances shall be sealed, and the generated waste gas shall be connected to the organic waste gas treatment facilities.
pe: The wastewater facilities used for gathering, storage and treatment of volatile organic compounds and malodorous substances shall be sealed, and the generated waste gas shall be connected to the organic waste gas treatment facilities.

src: 循环水场回水总管设物料泄漏监测设施，每月取样监测循环水回水中挥发性石油烃含量。
mt: Material leakage monitoring facilities shall be provided for the return main pipe of circulating water field, and samples shall be taken every month to monitor the volatile petroleum hydrocarbon content in the return water of circulating water.
pe: Material leakage monitoring facilities shall be provided for the return header of the circulating water field, and samples shall be taken every month to monitor the volatile petroleum hydrocarbon content in the return water of the circulating water.

src: 用于输送、储存、处理含挥发性有机物、恶臭物质的塔罐容器、大型机泵、管线系统等设专门用于停工检修吹扫、蒸煮、置换的流程与管线，及水、大气、固体废物污染控制设施在检维修时清扫气应接入有机废气回收、处理装置或火炬系统，其大气污染物排放符合标准排放限值的规定。
mt: The towers, tanks, large pumps, pipeline systems, etc. used for conveying, storing and treating volatile organic compounds and malodorous substances shall be provided with processes and pipelines specially used for shutdown, maintenance, purging, cooking and replacement, and the cleaning gas of water, air and solid waste pollution control facilities shall be connected to the organic waste gas recovery, treatment device or flare system during inspection and maintenance. The emission of atmospheric pollutants shall meet the provisions of standard emission limits.
pe: The towers, tanks, large pumps, pipeline systems, etc. used for transporting, storing and treating volatile organic compounds and malodorous substances shall be provided with flows and pipelines specially used for shutdown, maintenance, purging, cooking and replacement, and the scavenge gas of water, air and solid waste pollution control facilities shall be connected to the organic waste gas recovery, treatment plant or flare system during inspection and maintenance. The emission of atmospheric pollutants shall meet the provisions of standard emission limits.

src: 其它环节VOCs及恶臭污染物控制
mt: Control of VOCs and odor pollutants in other links
pe: Control of VOCs and malodorous pollutants in other links

src: 产品精制装置液化气脱硫醇尾气送入硫磺回收尾气焚烧炉焚烧处理。
mt: The tail gas from liquefied gas desulfurization of product refining unit is sent to sulfur recovery tail gas incinerator for incineration.
pe: The tail gas from liquefied gas sweetening of the product refining plant is sent to the sulfur recovery tail gas incinerator for incineration.

src: 生产装置内各地下污油罐放空管的排气应进行脱臭处理。
mt: The exhaust gas from the vent pipes of each underground slop tank in the production unit shall be deodorized.
pe: The exhaust gas from vent pipes of underground sump oil tanks in the production plant shall be deodorized.

src: 有组织控制措施
mt: Organizational controls
pe: Organized control measures

src: 选用高燃烧效率加热炉
mt: High combustion efficiency heating furnace selected
pe: Select a high combustion efficiency heating furnace

src: 加热炉燃烧效率≥93%
mt: Combustion efficiency of heating furnace ≥ 93%
pe: Combustion efficiency of the heating furnace ≥ 93%

src: 加热炉烟气VOCs排放浓度≤10mg/m3
mt: Emission concentration of VOCs in heating furnace flue gas ≤ 10mg / m3
pe: Emission concentration of VOCs from the heating furnace flue gas ≤ 10mg/m3

src: 连续重整催化剂再生烟气
mt: Continuous reforming catalyst regeneration flue gas
pe: Flue gas for continuous reforming catalyst regeneration

src: 造气制氢装置
mt: Hydrogen-producing gas-
pe: Gas and hydrogen production plant

src: 聚丙烯装置后处理系统不达标尾气
mt: Off-gas in the after-treatment system of polypropylene unit failing to meet the standard
pe: Tail gas not up to standard in the post-treatment system of the polypropylene plant

src: 催化剂再生废气
mt: Catalyst regeneration waste gas
pe: Regenerated waste gas from catalyst

src: 润滑油过滤器堵塞导致汽轮机轴承断油
mt: Turbine bearing oil cut-off due to blocked lube oil filter
pe: Turbine bearing oil cut-off due to blocked lubricating oil filter

src: 集中收集处理厂内有机废气，采用蓄热式焚烧炉焚烧处理
mt: Collect and treat the organic waste gas in the plant in a centralized manner, and use the heat storage incinerator for incineration
pe: Collect and treat the organic waste gas in the plant in a centralized manner, and use the regenerative incinerator for incineration

src: 装置密封设备选型
mt: Type selection of device sealing equipment
pe: Selection of sealing equipment for plant

src: 呼吸废气
mt: Respiratory exhaust
pe: Respiratory waste gas

src: 生化单元密闭收集的低浓度废气拟采用生物除臭+活性炭吸附组合工艺处理后达标排放
mt: The low-concentration waste gas collected by the closed biochemical unit is proposed to be discharged after being treated by the combined process of biological deodorization + activated carbon adsorption
pe: The low-concentration waste gas collected in a sealed way by the biochemical unit is planned to be treated by the combined process of biological deodorization and activated carbon adsorption and then discharged up to the standard

src: 预处理单元（调节、隔油、气浮）密闭收集的含烃类较高的废气送危废焚烧炉焚烧处理；
mt: The waste gas with high hydrocarbon content collected by the pre-treatment unit (regulation, oil separation and air flotation) is sent to the hazardous waste incinerator for incineration;
pe: The waste gas with high hydrocarbon content collected by the pre-treatment unit (regulation, oil separation and air flotation) in a sealed way is sent to the hazardous waste incinerator for incineration;

src: 设置VOCs管理台账，建立VOCs综合管控方案，强化VOCs管理及排查
mt: Set VOCs management ledger, establish comprehensive VOCs management and control scheme, and strengthen VOCs management and troubleshooting
pe: Set a VOCs management log, establish a comprehensive VOCs management and control scheme, and strengthen VOCs management and troubleshooting

src: 本项目所有装置不稳定时排放的泄压气均送厂内火炬处理，开停工吹扫时排出的气体也排入火炬系统。
mt: The pressure relief gas discharged when all units of the Project are unstable is sent to the flare in the plant for treatment, and the gas discharged during startup, shutdown and purging is also discharged into the flare system.
pe: The pressure relief gas discharged when all plants of the Project are unstable is sent to the flare in the plant for treatment, and the gas discharged during startup, shutdown and purging is also discharged into the flare system.

src: 依据各装置运行特征、检修分组、排放规律、界区压力、火炬气组成及热值、单个火炬的能力限制等对全厂火炬气进行合理分配，本项目共设置7套火炬系统，其中6座高架火炬，1座地面火炬。
mt: The flare gas of the whole plant shall be reasonably distributed according to the operation characteristics of each unit, maintenance grouping, rules of discharge, battery limit pressure, flare gas composition and calorific value, and capacity limit of a single flare, etc. A total of 7 flare systems are set up in this project, including 6 elevated flares and 1 ground flare.
pe: The flare gas of the whole plant shall be reasonably distributed according to the operation characteristics of each plant, maintenance grouping, rules of emission, battery limit pressure, flare gas composition and calorific value, and capacity limit of a single flare. A total of 7 flare systems are set up in the Project, including 6 elevated flares and 1 ground flare.

src: 高架火炬包括炼油高压火炬（DN1600）、炼油低压火炬（DN1700）、酸性气火炬（DN600）、芳烃高压火炬（DN1600）、化工烯烃高压火炬（DN1800）、化工聚烯烃高压火炬（DN1300）。
mt: Elevated flare includes high-pressure flare for oil refining (DN1600), low-pressure flare for oil refining (DN1700), acid gas flare (DN600), aromatics high-pressure flare (DN1600), chemical olefin high-pressure flare (DN1800) and chemical polyolefin high-pressure flare (DN1300).
pe: Elevated flares include high-pressure flare for oil refining (DN1600), low-pressure flare for oil refining (DN1700), acid gas flare (DN600), aromatics high-pressure flare (DN1600), chemical olefin high-pressure flare (DN1800) and chemical polyolefin high-pressure flare (DN1300).

src: 6座高架火炬共用1座180m火炬塔架。
mt: Six elevated flares share one 180m flare tower.
pe: 6 elevated flares share one 180m flare tower.

src: 火炬设施设置1座20000m3干式气柜。
mt: One 20000m3 dry-type gas cabinet is set for the flare facility.
pe: One 20000m3 dry-type gasholder is set for the flare facility.

src: 固体废物处理处置措施
mt: Solid waste disposal measures
pe: Treatment and disposal measures of solid waste

src: 本项目在生产运行管理中尽量安排好装置更换催化剂的时间，做到卸出的催化剂直接送往回收利用单位和危废处置中心，最大限度地减少危险废物在厂内的临时贮存量。
mt: In the production and operation management of the Project, the time for catalyst replacement of the unit shall be arranged as much as possible, so that the discharged catalyst is directly sent to the recycling unit and hazardous waste disposal center, and the temporary storage capacity of hazardous waste in the plant shall be minimized.
pe: In the production and operation management of the Project, the time for catalyst replacement of the plant shall be arranged as much as possible, so that the discharged catalyst is directly sent to the recycling organization and hazardous waste disposal center, and the temporary storage capacity of hazardous waste in the plant shall be minimized.

src: 动力站设三座灰库和两座渣库，可分别储存锅炉灰渣量72h。
mt: The power station is equipped with three ash silos and two slag silos, which can store the boiler ash and slag for 72h respectively.
pe: The power station is equipped with three ash silos and two sludge silos, which can store the boiler ash and sludge for 72h respectively.

src: 设计中尽量选用低噪声工艺流程、优化工艺管道及设备布置，从源头上减少噪声源的强度和数量。
mt: In the design, low-noise process flow shall be selected as much as possible, and process pipeline and equipment layout shall be optimized to reduce the intensity and quantity of noise sources from the source.
pe: In the design, low-noise process flow shall be selected as much as possible, and process pipelines and equipment layout shall be optimized to reduce the intensity and quantity of noise sources from the source.

src: 加热炉、裂解炉等在设计时选用低噪声燃烧器，火炬设计时选用低噪声火炬头。
mt: Low-noise burners shall be selected for the design of heating furnace and cracking furnace, and low-noise flare heads shall be selected for flare design.
pe: Low-noise burners shall be selected for the design of heating furnaces and cracking furnaces, and low-noise flare heads shall be selected for flare design.

src: 当机泵、压缩机、鼓风机、空冷器等产生的噪声仍不满足厂界噪声标准时，采取吸声、消声、隔声等降噪措施。
mt: When the noise generated by pumps, compressors, blowers, air coolers, etc. still does not meet the noise standard of the plant boundary, noise reduction measures such as sound absorption, noise elimination and sound insulation shall be taken.
pe: When the noise generated by pumps, compressors, blowers, air coolers, etc. still does not meet the noise standard at the plant boundary, noise reduction measures such as sound absorption, noise elimination and sound insulation shall be taken.

src: 各种高噪声的气体或蒸汽放空口应设置放空消声器。
mt: Vent silencers shall be provided at various high-noise gas or steam vents.
pe: Vent silencers shall be provided at high-noise gas or steam vents.

src: 主要包括地下管道、地下容器、（储罐）、（半）地下污水池、油品储罐的罐基础等。
mt: It mainly includes underground pipelines, underground vessels, (storage tanks), (semi-) underground sewage tanks, tank foundations of oil storage tanks, etc.
pe: It mainly includes underground pipelines, underground vessels, (storage tanks), (semi-) underground wastewater tanks and tank foundations of oil storage tanks.

src: 主要包括架空设备、容器、管道、装置区地面、明沟等。
mt: It mainly includes overhead equipment, vessels, pipelines, ground in unit area, open trench, etc.
pe: It mainly includes overhead equipment, vessels, pipelines, ground in plant areas and open trenches.

src: 本项目地下水污染防治分区情况列于下表：
mt: The division of groundwater pollution prevention and control of the Project is listed in the following table:
pe: The division for prevention and control of groundwater pollution is listed in the following table:

src: (kW/ 台)
mt: (Kw / set)
pe: (kW/set)

src: 石油化工设备、地下管道或建、构筑物防渗的设计使用年限分别不应低于相应设备、地下管道或建、构筑物的设计使用年限；
mt: The design service life for seepage control of petrochemical equipment, underground pipelines or buildings and structures shall not be lower than the design service life of corresponding equipment, underground pipelines or buildings and structures respectively;
pe: The design service life for seepage control of petrochemical equipment, underground pipelines or buildings and structures shall not be lower than that of corresponding equipment, underground pipelines or buildings and structures respectively;

src: 污染防治区应设置防渗层，防渗层可由单一或多种防渗材料组成。
mt: The anti-seepage layer shall be set in the pollution prevention area, and the anti-seepage layer can be composed of single or multiple anti-seepage materials.
pe: An anti-seepage layer shall be set in the pollution prevention and control area. The layer can be composed of single or multiple anti-seepage materials.

src: 当污染物有腐蚀性时，防渗材料应具有耐腐蚀性能或采取防腐处理。
mt: When the pollutants are corrosive, the anti-seepage materials shall have corrosion resistance or take anti-corrosion treatment.
pe: When the pollutants are corrosive, the anti-seepage materials shall be corrosion resistant or provided with anti-corrosion treatment measures.

src: 重点部位防渗要求
mt: Anti-seepage requirements for key parts
pe: Anti-seepage requirements for critical parts

src: 高密度聚乙烯（HDPE）膜的厚度不宜小于1.50mm；
mt: The thickness of high density polyethylene (HDPE) film should not be less than 1.50mm;
pe: The thickness of high-density polyethylene (HDPE) membrane should not be less than 1.50mm;

src: 膜上、膜下设置保护层，保护层可采用长丝无纺土工布，膜下也可采用不含尖锐颗粒的砂层，砂层厚度不应小于100mm；
mt: Protective layers shall be set up on and under the membrane. The protective layer can be made of long-wire non-woven geotextile, and the sand layer without sharp particles can also be used under the membrane. The thickness of the sand layer shall not be less than 100mm;
pe: Protective layers shall be set up on and under the membrane. The protective layer can be made of filament non-woven geotextile, and the sand layer without sharp particles can also be used under the membrane. The thickness of the sand layer shall not be less than 100mm;

src: 储存温度高于60℃苯系物的环墙式罐基础不应采用铺设高密度聚乙烯（HDPE）膜的防渗方式，应采用承台式罐基础防渗。
mt: The anti-seepage method of laying high-density polyethylene (HDPE) film shall not be adopted for the ring-wall tank foundation for storing benzene series with a temperature higher than 60 °C, and the pile cap tank foundation shall be adopted for anti-seepage.
pe: The anti-seepage method for laying of high-density polyethylene (HDPE) membrane shall not be adopted for the ring-wall tank foundation for storing benzene series with a temperature higher than 60 °C, and the bearing platform tank foundation shall be adopted for anti-seepage.

src: 承台式罐基础的防渗，应符合下列规定：
mt: The anti-seepage of pile cap tank foundation shall meet the following requirements:
pe: The anti-seepage of the bearing platform tank foundation shall meet the following requirements:

src: 承台顶面应找坡，由中心坡向四周，坡度不宜小于0.3%。
mt: The top surface of the pile cap shall be sloped from the center slope to the periphery, and the slope should not be less than 0.3%.
pe: The top surface of the bearing platform shall be sloped from the center to the periphery, and the slope should not be less than 0.3%.

src: 防火堤的设计除符合现行国家标准《储罐区防火堤设计规范》GB50351的要求外，尚应符合下列规定：
mt: In addition to the requirements of the current national standard Code for Design of Fire Embankment in Storage Tank Area (GB50351), the design of fire dike shall also meet the following requirements:
pe: In addition to the requirements of the current national standard Code for Design of Fire Dike in Storage Tank Farm (GB50351), the design of fire dike shall also meet the following requirements:

src: 防火堤的变形缝应设置不锈钢板止水带，厚度不应小于2.0mm。
mt: The deformation joint of the fire dike shall be provided with stainless steel plate waterstop, and the thickness shall not be less than 2.0mm.
pe: The deformation joint of the fire dike shall be provided with a stainless steel plate waterstop, and the thickness shall not be less than 2.0mm.

src: 变形缝内应设置嵌缝板、背衬材料和嵌缝密封料。
mt: Caulking plates, backing materials and caulking sealing materials shall be provided in deformation joints.
pe: Joint fillers, backing materials and joint sealing materials shall be provided in the deformation joints.

src: 混凝土水池、污水沟和井的混凝土耐久性应符合现行国家标准《混凝土结构设计规范》GB50010的有关规定，且混凝土强度等级不宜低于C30。
mt: The concrete durability of concrete pools, sewage ditches and wells shall comply with the relevant provisions of the current national standard Code for Design of Concrete Structures (GB50010), and the concrete strength grade shall not be lower than C30.
pe: The concrete durability for concrete tanks, wastewater trenches and wells shall comply with the relevant provisions of the current national standard Code for Design of Concrete Structures (GB50010), and the concrete strength grade should not be lower than C30.

src: 位于一般污染区的水池和污水沟，尚应符合下列规定：
mt: The pool and sewage ditch located in the general pollution area shall also meet the following requirements:
pe: The tanks and wastewater trenches located in the general pollution and control areas shall also meet the following requirements:

src: 结构厚度：水池不应小于250mm，污水沟不应小于150mm。
mt: Structural thickness: Not less than 250mm for water tank and not less than 150mm for sewage ditch.
pe: Structural thickness: not less than 250mm for water tanks and not less than 150mm for wastewater trenches.

src: 位于重点污染区的水池、污水沟和井，尚应符合下列规定：
mt: The pools, sewage ditches and wells located in key pollution areas shall also meet the following requirements:
pe: The tanks, wastewater trenches and wells located in the critical pollution and control areas shall also meet the following requirements:

src: 具体要求，请查阅中国驻柬埔寨使领馆通知。
mt: For specific requirements, please refer to the notice of Chinese Embassy and Consulate in Cambodia.
pe: For specific requirements, please refer to the notice of the Chinese Embassy and Consulates in Cambodia.

src: 结合工程建设的实际情况，采取主动防渗措施，满足本项目的实际工程需要。
mt: According to the actual situation of the project construction, active anti-seepage measures shall be taken to meet the actual project needs of the project.
pe: According to the actual situation of the project construction, active anti-seepage measures shall be taken to meet the actual project needs.

src: 加大管道设计腐蚀裕量。
mt: Increase the corrosion allowance of pipeline design.
pe: The pipeline design corrosion allowance shall be increased.

src: 管道设计壁厚的腐蚀余量应不小于2mm。
mt: The corrosion allowance of pipe design wall thickness shall not be less than 2mm.
pe: Corrosion allowance of design wall thickness of pipeline shall be no less than 2mm.

src: 施工时应采用无溶剂环保型环氧煤沥青底漆及面漆，防腐层质量检验和施工要求、检漏电压等验收要求应符合《石油化工给水排水管道工程施工及验收规范》SH3533-20013中的环氧煤沥青涂料的相关规定。
mt: Solvent-free environment-friendly epoxy coal tar primer and finish coat shall be used during construction. The quality inspection and construction requirements of anti-corrosive coating, leakage detection voltage and other acceptance requirements shall comply with the relevant provisions of the epoxy coal tar paint in the Specification for Construction and Acceptance of Water and Sewerage Pipeline Works in Petrochemical Industry SH3533-20013.
pe: Solvent-free environment-friendly epoxy coal tar primer and finish coat shall be used during construction. The quality inspection and construction requirements of anti-corrosive coating, leakage detection voltage and other acceptance requirements shall comply with the relevant provisions of the epoxy coal tar paint in the Code for Construction and Acceptance of Water and Sewerage Pipelines in Petrochemical Industry SH3533-20013.

src: 埋地污水管道全部采用钢管焊接+内防腐设计，最小管径≥100mm。
mt: All buried sewage pipes are designed with steel pipe welding + internal corrosion prevention, and the minimum pipe diameter is ≥ 100mm.
pe: All buried wastewater pipelines are designed with steel pipe welding + internal corrosion prevention, and the minimum pipe diameter is ≥ 100mm.

src: 工艺生产装置内的含油、含盐污水检查井或水封井、污染雨水检查井或水封井井盖应该密封，并按规定设置通气管。
mt: Oily and saline sewage inspection wells or water seal wells, polluted rainwater inspection wells or water seal well covers in the process production units shall be sealed, and ventilation pipes shall be set up as required.
pe: Oil-bearing and salted wastewater inspection wells or water seal wells, polluted rainwater inspection wells or water seal well covers in the process production plants shall be sealed, and ventilation pipes shall be set up as required.

src: 所有穿越地下污水系统构筑物的管道穿越处均设置防水套管。
mt: All pipe crossings through underground sewage system structures shall be provided with waterproof sleeves.
pe: All pipe crossings through underground wastewater system structures shall be provided with waterproof sleeves.

src: 对架空压力流污水系统设置压力计量监控措施，便于日常监测。
mt: Pressure measurement monitoring measures shall be taken for the overhead pressure flow sewage system to facilitate daily monitoring.
pe: Pressure measurement monitoring measures shall be taken for the overhead pressure-flow wastewater system for daily monitoring.

src: 拟建项目按照《石油化工环境保护设计规范》（SH/T3024-2017）的要求，设置环境监测站。
mt: The environmental monitoring station shall be set up for the proposed project according to the requirements of Design Specification for Environmental Protection in Petrochemical Industry (SH / T3024-2017).
pe: The environmental monitoring station shall be set up for the proposed project according to the requirements of the Design Specification for Environmental Protection of Petrochemical Industry (SH/T3024-2017).

src: 按照《排污口规范化整治技术要求》（环监[1996]470号）规范设置本项目的排污口，排污口标志符合《环境保护图形标志排放口（源）》（GB15562.1-1995）的要求，排放口标志牌技术规格符合《环办[2003]95号》的规定。
mt: The sewage outlet of the Project shall be set according to the Technical Requirements for Standardized Regulation of Sewage Outlets (HJ [1996] No. 470). The sewage outlet mark shall meet the requirements of Graphical Discharge Outlet (Source) for Environmental Protection (GB15562.1-1995), and the technical specification of the outlet signboard shall meet the requirements of HB [2003] No. 95.
pe: The sewage outlet shall be set according to the Technical Requirements for Normalized Treatment of Sewage Outlets (HJ [1996] No. 470). The sewage outlet mark shall meet the requirements of Graphical Signs for Environmental Protection - Discharge Outlet (Source) (GB15562.1-1995), and the technical specification of the outlet signboard shall meet the requirements of HB [2003] No. 95.

src: 废气直接排放的，在烟道上设置监测点位；多股废气混合排放的，在废气汇合后的混合烟道上设置监测点位；有旁路的旁路烟道也设置监测点位；有机废气回收处理装置分别在其废气入口及排放口设置监测点位；对处理效率有特殊要求的废气治理设施的进出口均设置监测点位。
mt: If the waste gas is directly discharged, monitoring points shall be set on the flue; for mixed exhaust of multi-strand waste gas, monitoring points shall be set on the mixed flue after the waste gas merges; the bypass flue with bypass is also provided with monitoring points; the organic waste gas recovery and treatment device is provided with monitoring points at the waste gas inlet and outlet respectively; monitoring points shall be set at the inlet and outlet of waste gas treatment facilities with special requirements on treatment efficiency.
pe: If the waste gas is directly discharged, monitoring points shall be set on the flue; for mixed exhaust of multi waste gas, monitoring points shall be set on the mixed flue after the waste gas merges; the bypass flue with a bypass is also provided with monitoring points; the organic waste gas recovery and treatment plant is provided with monitoring points at the waste gas inlet and outlet respectively; monitoring points shall be set at the inlet and outlet of waste gas treatment facilities with special requirements on treatment efficiency.

src: 本项目有组织废气排放监测点位、监测项目及最低监测频次按下表执行：

src: 根据调查的具体内容，本项目的调查选择实地勘察、公示公告、问卷调查、走访群众和舆情分析等多种方法与方式，达到广泛调查、充分收集各方意见和诉求的目的。

src: 本项目在建设前期，为了更好的宣传本项目，同时广泛收集群众意见并营造良好的舆论氛围，在项目建设单位和当地村干部的带领下，评估小组于2021年4月19日，在麻盖行政村对本项目进行了张榜公示，公示期10天，公示期间未收到群众反对意见。
mt: In the early stage of the construction of the Project, in order to better publicize the Project, widely collect the opinions of the masses and create a good atmosphere of public opinion, the assessment team, under the leadership of the Employer and local village cadres, publicized the Project on April 19, 2021 in Magai Administrative Village. The publicity period is 10 days, and no objections from the masses were received during the publicity period.
pe: In the early stage of the construction of the Project, in order to better publicize the Project, widely collect the opinions of the masses and create a good atmosphere of public opinion, the assessment team, under the leadership of the Employer and local village officials, publicized the Project on April 19, 2021 in Magai Administrative Village. pe: Measures: When the crane suspends the tie bar (beam), align and straighten the sling to avoid jamming. The towing ropes at both ends of the tie bar are tied firmly and stably. The crane rotates slowly at a constant speed.

src: 措施：砸松由壬，释放扭劲再旋开；吊挂时避免憋劲、吊带拴挂牢靠，严禁把手放在鹅颈管与井架空隙之间。

pe: Measures: Loosen the union, release the twisting force and then unscrew it; avoid jamming during hanging, and fasten the sling firmly. It is strictly prohibited to place the hand between the gooseneck and the derrick gap.

mt: At the same time, when the pressure of the hydrogen storage tank is lower than the set value, the hydrogen generation device will automatically start to fill the hydrogen storage tank with hydrogen.
pe: At the same time, when the pressure of the hydrogen storage tank is lower than the set value, the hydrogen generation unit will automatically start to fill the hydrogen storage tank with hydrogen.

src: 2.一台吊车在吊钩上挂2根2t×6米绳套，伸至井架拉筋（梁）正上方中心位置，井架人员挂入吊耳，拴挂牵引绳，吊车收直绳套，井架人员拆除别针及连接销，对向推拉筋脱离耳板，吊车吊移拉筋至地面。
mt: 2. One crane hangs two 2tX6m rope sleeves on the hook and extends to the center position right above the derrick tie bar (beam). The derrick personnel hangs the lifting lugs and hangs the traction rope. The crane straightens the rope sleeve. The derrick personnel removes the pins and connecting pins. The opposite push-pull bar is separated from the ear plate. The crane lifts the tie bar to the ground.
pe: 2. One crane hangs two 2tx6m slings on the hook and extends to the center position right above the derrick tie bar (beam). The derrick personnel hangs the lifting lugs and hangs the towing rope. The crane straightens the sling. The derrick personnel removes the safety pins and connecting pins. The opposite push-pull bar is separated from the ear plate. The crane lifts the tie bar to the ground.

src: 当氢气贮罐的压力达到设定值时，制氢装置自动停止运行，转入热备用状态，等待下一次启动。
mt: When the pressure of the hydrogen storage tank reaches the set value, the hydrogen generation device will automatically stop running, switch to the hot standby state, and wait for the next startup.
pe: When the pressure of the hydrogen storage tank reaches the set value, the hydrogen generation unit will automatically stop running, switch to the hot standby state, and wait for the next startup.

src: 按此步骤从前向后依次拆除其它拉筋（梁）。
mt: Remove other tie bars (beams) from front to back in sequence according to this step.
pe: Remove other tie bars (beams) from front to rear according to this step.

src: 当一套水电解制氢设备发生故障时，运行人员可启动另一套水电解制氢设备，保证系统能稳定、连续生产氢气。
mt: When one set of water electrolysis hydrogen production equipment fails, the operator can start another set of water electrolysis hydrogen production equipment to ensure that the system can produce hydrogen stably and continuously.
pe: When one set of water electrolysis unit for hydrogen production fails, the operator can start another set of water electrolysis unit for hydrogen production to ensure that the system can produce hydrogen stably and continuously.
