src: 若系统压力小于0.5MPa时，则需要用氮气吹扫置换并满足条件要求后则可由操作人员就地手动恢复运行。
mt: If the system pressure is less than 0.5MPa, it is necessary to purge and replace with nitrogen and meet the requirements, and then the operator can manually resume operation locally.
pe: If the system pressure is less than 0.5MPa, it is necessary to purge and replace it with nitrogen to satisfy the requirements and then the operator can manually resume operation locally.

src: 3.拆开井架运输架，指挥吊车上提，将井架左右下段分别平稳吊至安装位置，安装在井架支座上。
mt: 3. Disassemble the derrick transportation frame, command the crane to lift it up, lift the left and right lower sections of the derrick to the installation position, and install it on the derrick support.
pe: 3. Disassemble the derrick transport frame, guide the crane to lift it up, lift the left and right lower segments of the derrick to the installation position stably, and install it on the derrick support.

src: 吊车慢放井架下段至小支架上，下放摘取绳套，完成下段井架的安装。
mt: Slowly lower the lower section of the derrick to the small support by the crane, lower the rope picking sleeve, and complete the installation of the lower section of the derrick.
pe: Slowly lower the lower segment of the derrick to the small support by the crane, lower the slings, and complete the installation of the lower segment of the derrick.

src: 安装井架下段
mt: Installation of the lower section of the derrick
pe: Installing the lower segment of the derrick

src: 1.移停两台吊车至两侧井架中下段安装位置，平稳吊移井架中下段至安装位置，安装连接螺栓。
mt: 1. Move and stop two cranes to the installation position of the middle and lower sections of the derrick on both sides, stably lift and move the middle and lower sections of the derrick to the installation position, and install the connecting bolts.
pe: 1. Move and stop two cranes to the installation position of the middle and lower segments of the derrick on both sides, stably lift and move the middle and lower segments of the derrick to the installation position, and install the connecting bolts.

src: 2.一台吊车用4根2t绳套挂连接架吊耳并拴好尾绳，平稳吊移到井架中下段安装位置，安装连接销及别针。
mt: 2. A crane shall be equipped with 4 2t ropes to hang the lifting lug of the connecting frame and tie the tail rope. The crane shall be stably hoisted to the installation position of the middle and lower sections of the derrick, and the connecting pin and pin shall be installed.
pe: 2. A crane shall be equipped with four 2t slings to hang the lifting lug of the connecting frame and tie the tail rope. The crane shall be stably hoisted to the installation position of the middle and lowersegments of the derrick, and the connecting pin and safety pin shall be installed.

src: 当失去WND除盐水水源时,水箱内贮存的除盐水送至氢气生产装置，当水箱水位低至下限值时，则制氢设备自动停运。
mt: When the water source of WND demineralized water is lost, the demineralized water stored in the water tank is sent to the hydrogen production unit. When the water level of the water tank is low to the lower limit value, the hydrogen generation equipment will shut down automatically.
pe: When the water source of demineralized water (WND) is lost, the demineralized water stored in the water tank is sent to the hydrogen production unit. When the water level of the water tank is as low as the lower limit value, the hydrogen generation equipment will shut down automatically.

src: 调整连接架另一端耳板位置，若偏差较大，两台吊车分别轻提井架大腿和方梁，配合对销孔，安装连接销及别针。
mt: Adjust the position of the ear plate at the other end of the connecting frame. If the deviation is large, the two cranes shall lift the derrick thigh and square beam respectively, cooperate with the pin hole, and install the connecting pin and pin.
pe: Adjust the position of the ear plate at the other end of the connecting frame. If the deviation is large, the two cranes shall lift the derrick leg and square beam respectively, cooperate with the pin hole, and install the connecting pin and safety pin.

src: 3.用2根2t绳套水平吊移横拉筋及斜拉筋至安装位置。
mt: 3. Use two 2t rope sleeves to horizontally lift the transverse tie bar and diagonal tie bar to the installation position.
pe: 3. Use two 2t slings to horizontally lift the transverse tie bar and diagonal tie bar to the installation position.

src: 安装连接销及别针。
mt: Install the connecting pin and pin.
pe: Installing the connecting pin and safety pin.

src: 将小支架运移至第二节井架前端合适位置，指挥吊车下放井架中下段至小支架。
mt: Move the small support to the appropriate position at the front end of the second section of derrick, and command the crane to lower the middle and lower sections of the derrick to the small support.
pe: Move the small support to the appropriate position at the front end of the second segment of derrick, and guide the crane to lower the middle and lower segments of the derrick to the small support.

src: 6.按步骤3～4，依次完成井架中段拉筋安装。
mt: 6.install the tie bar in the middle section of the derrick in sequence according to steps 3 ~ 4.
pe: 6.Install the tie bar in the middle segment of the derrick in sequence according to steps 3~4.

src: 7.按步骤5-6依次完成井架主体安装。
mt: 7.install the derrick body in sequence according to steps 5-6.
pe: 7.Install the derrick body in sequence according to steps 5-6.

src: 1.安装第三节井架前，在地面上提前安装立管操作台，穿连接销及安全锁销（别针），卡紧保险绳（链）。
mt: 1. Before installing the third section of derrick, install the stand pipe console on the ground in advance, thread the connecting pin and safety lock pin (pin), and fasten the safety rope (chain).
pe: 1. Before installing the third segment of derrick, install the standpipe console on the ground in advance, place the connecting pin and safety lock pin (safety pin), and fasten the safety rope (chain).

src: 2.安装井架过程中连接、紧固对应的立管由壬，指挥吊车用吊带提起水龙带上端，与鹅颈管连接、紧固，卡紧保险绳。
mt: 2. During the installation of the derrick, connect and fasten the corresponding stand pipe from the buffer block, command the crane to lift the upper end of the hose with a sling, connect and fasten it with the gooseneck, and clamp the safety rope.
pe: 2. During the installation of the derrick, connect and fasten the corresponding standpipe union, guide the crane to lift the upper end of the rotary hose with a sling, connect and fasten it with the gooseneck, and clamp the safety rope.

pe: (The crown block can also be used, with a single derrick, upper and lower tie bars on the ground, tighten the bolts, and then use two cranes to lift the head segment of crown block).

src: 若系统压力小于0.5MPa，则需要用氮气进行吹扫置换，并按规程要求重新启动设备。
mt: If the system pressure is less than 0.5MPa, it is necessary to purge and replace with nitrogen, and restart the equipment according to the regulations.
pe: If the system pressure is less than 0.5MPa, it is necessary to purge and replace it with nitrogen and restart the equipment according to the regulations.

src: 正常停运是指停止变压器-整流器的操作，或者是贮存压力超过设定值时发生的自动停运。
mt: Normal shutdown refers to shutdown of transformer-rectifier or automatic shutdown when the storage pressure exceeds the set value.
pe: Normal shutdown refers to the shutdown of transformer-rectifier or automatic shutdown when the storage pressure exceeds the set value.

src: 氢气生产系统的全部控制均是在AH厂房就地完成。
mt: All control of hydrogen production system is completed locally in AH building.
pe: All control of the hydrogen production system is completed locally in the AH building.

src: 在AH 厂房控制室内的配电柜上设有紧急停运按钮，可用于整套系统全部设备的紧急停运。
mt: An emergency shutdown button is set on the power distribution cabinet in the control room of AH building, which can be used for emergency shutdown of all equipment of the whole system.
pe: An emergency shutdown button is provided on the power distribution cabinet in the control room of the AH building for emergency shutdown of all equipment of the entire system.

src: 同时，氢气的生产应根据氢气贮罐上的压力信号进行自动控制。
mt: At the same time, hydrogen production shall be automatically controlled according to the pressure signal on the hydrogen storage tank.
pe: At the same time, hydrogen production shall be automatically controlled according to the pressure signal of the hydrogen storage tank.

src: 当氢气贮罐的压力超过设定值时，氢气生产设备会自动停运，并报警，且进行超压排放。
mt: When the pressure of the hydrogen storage tank exceeds the set value, the hydrogen production equipment will automatically shut down, give an alarm and conduct overpressure discharge.
pe: When the pressure of the hydrogen storage tank exceeds the set value, the hydrogen production equipment will be shut down automatically, give alarms and perform overpressure discharge;

src: 氢气在发电机内作为排出热量的冷却介质使用，用氢气充灌发电机的操作必须按照明确的规程进行，以避免任何发生爆炸的可能。
mt: Hydrogen is used as a cooling medium for heat removal in the generator. The operation of filling the generator with hydrogen must be carried out in accordance with clear regulations to avoid any possibility of explosion.
pe: Hydrogen is used as a cooling medium for removing heat in the generator. The operation of filling the generator with hydrogen must be carried out in accordance with explicit regulations to avoid any possibility of explosion.

src: 在用二氧化碳吹扫出发电机全部空气并使其处于安全状态后，即可用氢气充灌发电机。
mt: After purging all air of the generator with carbon dioxide and making it safe, the generator can be filled with hydrogen.
pe: After purging all air of the generator with carbon dioxide and under a safe state, the generator can be filled with hydrogen.

src: 措施：安装时，人员先站在井架上用绳索将支梁拉至销孔附近固定，然后进行对孔穿销子。
mt: Measures: During installation, personnel shall first stand on the derrick and pull the support beam to the vicinity of the pin hole with ropes for fixing, and then put the pin through the hole.
pe: Measures: During installation, personnel shall first stand on the derrick and pull the support beam to the vicinity of the pin hole with ropes for fixing, and then place the pins.

src: 3.钻井队大班或干部全程参与指导作业过程。
mt: 3. The drilling team or cadres shall participate in the whole process of guiding the operation.
pe: 3. The drilling team or cadres shall participate in the whole process to guide the operation process.

src: 4.安装钻台简易防护链、钻台系挂安全带撑杆。
mt: 4. Install the simple protective chain of the drill floor, and fasten the safety belt stay bar of the drill floor.
pe: 4. Install the simple protective chain of the drill floor, and fasten the safety harness brace rod of the drill floor.

src: 1.两台吊车停放在紧靠井架底座外两侧，支腿完全伸出，支撑牢靠，无下陷，车身整体处于水平状态。
mt: 1. Two cranes shall be parked on both sides close to the derrick base, with supporting legs fully extended, firmly supported, without sinking, and the whole body in a horizontal state.
pe: 1. Two cranes shall park on both sides close to the derrick substructure, with supporting legs fully stretching out, firmly supported, without sinking, and the whole body in a horizontal state.

src: 5.安装前后腿连接销。
mt: 5.install the front and rear leg connecting pins.
pe: 5.Install the front and rear leg connecting pins.

src: 4.指挥吊车缓慢翻转人字梁向前倾斜，下放至枕木上。

pe: 4. Guide the crane to slowly turn the A-frame to forward and lower it onto the sleeper.

src: 操作人员将牵引绳拴挂在前腿支脚下端。
mt: The operator shall tie the traction rope to the lower end of the front leg support.
pe: The operator shall tie the towing rope to the lower end of the front leg support.

src: 3.吊装指挥进行“五个确认”，指挥吊车缓慢上提，配合操作人员，使用榔头和专用钢棒砸出两侧人字架前腿销轴。
mt: 3. The hoisting commander shall carry out "five confirmations," command the crane to lift up slowly, cooperate with the operator, and use a hammer and a special steel bar to smash the front leg pin shafts of the herringbone frames on both sides.
pe: 3. The hoisting signaller shall carry out "five confirmations", guide the crane to lift up slowly, cooperate with the operator, and use a hammer and a special steel bar to smash the front leg pin shafts of A-frame on both sides.

src: 1.司索人员将钢丝绳（12t×10米）拴挂在人字架支腿防磨套（吊耳）处,将牵引绳分别拴挂在人字架两端。
mt: 1. The cable driver shall hang the steel wire rope (12tX10m) at the anti-wear sleeve (lifting lug) of the legs of the herringbone frame, and hang the traction rope at both ends of the herringbone frame respectively.
pe: 1. The rigger shall hang the steel wire rope (12tx10m) at the anti-wear sleeve (lifting lug) of the legs of A-frame, and hang the towing rope at both ends of A-frame respectively.

src: 2.指挥吊车缓慢上提配合，操作人员用榔头和专用钢棒砸出人字架销轴。
mt: 2. Command the crane to slowly lift and cooperate, and the operator shall use a hammer and a special steel bar to smash the pin shaft of the herringbone frame.
pe: 2. Guide the crane to slowly lift and cooperate, and the operator shall use a hammer and a special steel bar to smash the pin shaft of A-frame.

src: 3.将人字架吊至场地，按照本井拆卸定置摆放图摆放好。
mt: 3. Lift the herringbone frame to the site, and place it according to the disassembly and placement diagram of the well.
pe: 3. Lift the A-frame to the site, and place it according to the disassembly position of the well.

src: 4.重复步骤1～3，拆卸另一侧人字架。
mt: 4.repeat steps 1 ~ 3 and remove the herringbone bracket on the other side.
pe: 4.Repeat steps 1~3 and remove the A-frame on the other side.

src: 现场安装前应进行产品检查，包装及外观应完好、无受潮，装置型号、附件、备品备件等符合订货合同要求，产品说明书、合格证、装箱单、出厂试验记录（报告）等应齐全。

pe: Before on-site installation, product inspection shall be carried out. The packaging and appearance shall be intact and free of moisture. src: 1.将4根16t×8米绳套分别挂在1#泥浆泵底座4个吊耳上。

src: 2.指挥人员指挥两台吊车配合，同时平稳试起吊泥浆泵，吊起10～20cm停止。

pe: 2. The signaller directs the cooperation of two cranes, and at the same time, the mud pump shall be lifted stably and stopped after being lifted for 10~20cm.

src: 3.检查确认正常后指挥起吊泥浆泵，吊移至指定位置后缓慢下放。

pe: 3. After checking and confirming that it is normal, command to lift the mud pump, and slowly lower it after lifting to the designated position.

src: 1.将4根4t×8米绳套分别挂在灌注泵橇4个吊耳上，对角拴好牵引绳。

pe: 1. Hang four 4tx8m slings on the four lifting lugs of the grouting pump skid, and tie the towing rope diagonally.

src: 2.指挥吊车吊移灌注泵橇至指定位置。

src: 措施：起吊过程中吊车操作平稳缓慢，人员站位正确，对角使用牵引绳控制设备摆动。

pe: Measures: During the lifting, the crane shall be operated stably and slowly, the personnel shall stand correctly, and the equipment shall be controlled to swing diagonally with the towing rope.

src: 措施：试起吊千斤有下陷迹象要及时放下设备重新垫实千斤腿，吊车吊臂长度适中，操作平稳。

pe: Measures: If there is any sign of sinking in the trial lifting jack, the equipment shall be lowered in time and the jack legs shall be padded again. The crane boom shall be of moderate length and stable operation.

src: 措施：指挥人员站位正确，两台吊车停放位置合理，能同时清晰收到指挥信号，平稳缓慢操作。

src: 本细则所称承包商是指川庆公司以外向院提供工程 技术、工程建设及检维修、安全环保、网络信息、设备维修5类服务的经营者。

pe: The term "Contractor" as mentioned in the Detailed Implementation Rules refers to the operator who provides engineering technology, engineering construction, inspection and maintenance, safety and environmental protection, network information and equipment maintenance to the Institute outside CCDC.

src: 本细则所称承包商管理是指对进入院市场的承包商进 行资格评审、选择使用、考核评价、监督检查等活动的管理。
mt: The term "contractor management" as mentioned in these Rules refers to the management of activities such as qualification evaluation, selection and use, assessment and evaluation, supervision and inspection of contractors entering the market of the Institute.
pe: The term "contractor management" as mentioned in the Detailed Implementation Rules refers to the management of activities such as qualification evaluation, selection and use, assessment and evaluation, supervision and inspection of contractors entering the market of the Institute.

src: 为了使晶核成长加快，通常在碳化塔的中部维持较高的温度，以提高结晶的成长速度。
mt: In order to accelerate the growth of the crystal nucleus, a higher temperature is usually maintained in the middle of the carbonization tower to improve the growth rate of crystallization.
pe: In order to accelerate the growth of the crystal nucleus, a higher temperature is usually kept in the middle of the carbonation tower to improve the growth rate of crystals.

src: 随着NaHCO3结晶的析出，在碳化塔的下部用冷却水将化学反应热和结晶热移出以使溶液温度降低，以提高溶液中的NaHCO3的过饱和度。
mt: With the precipitation of NaHCO3 crystallization, the chemical reaction heat and crystallization heat are removed with cooling water at the lower part of the carbonization tower to reduce the solution temperature, so as to improve the oversaturation of NaHCO3 in the solution.
pe: With the precipitation of NaHCO3 crystals, the chemical reaction heat and crystal heat are removed with cooling water at the lower part of the carbonation tower to reduce the solution temperature, so as to improve the over-saturation of NaHCO3 in the solution.

src: 在冷却过程中应逐渐均匀地降温，以易于形成较短的圆柱形的NaHCO3结晶，但如果溶液的温度迅速降低，则可能导致二次晶核的大量生成，或使已生成的结晶相互粘结，从而给NaHCO3结晶的过滤和洗涤带来困难。
mt: During the cooling process, the temperature should be gradually and evenly cooled to easily form short cylindrical NaHCO3 crystals. However, if the temperature of the solution decreases rapidly, it may cause large amount of secondary crystal nucleus or bond the generated crystals to each other, thus bringing difficulties to the filtration and washing of NaHCO3 crystals.
pe: During the cooling process, the temperature shall be gradually and evenly cooled to easily form short cylindrical NaHCO3 crystals. However, if the temperature of the solution decreases rapidly, it may cause large amount of secondary crystal nucleus or bonding of generated crystals, thus bringing difficulties to the filtration and washing of NaHCO3 crystals.

src: 本公司在结构化主体中持有控制性的份额，因持有投资份额而享有的回报将使本公司面临可变回报的影响重大，且本公司对结构化主体的权力将影响其取得的可变回报，所以本公司将该结构化主体纳入合并。
mt: The Company holds a controlling share in the structured entity. The return enjoyed by holding the investment share will have a significant impact on the Company's variable return, and the Company's power over the structured entity will affect the variable return obtained, so the Company will incorporate the structured entity into the merger.
pe: The Company holds a controlling share in the structured entity. The return enjoyed by holding the investment share will have a significant impact on the Company's variable return, and the Company's power over the structured entity will affect the variable return obtained, so the Company incorporates the structured entity into consolidation.

src: 所以在碳酸化过程中必须按照结晶过程的要求严格控制碳化塔的温度分布。
mt: Therefore, the temperature distribution of the carbonation tower must be strictly controlled according to the requirements of the crystallization process during carbonation.
pe: Therefore, the temperature distribution of carbonation tower must be strictly controlled according to the requirements of the crystal process during carbonation.

src: （F） 及时对制碱用碳化塔的结晶质量、尾气压力和二氧化碳含量、出碱液的CNH3和FNH3的浓度变化进行检测，发现问题即时采取适当的措施进行处理。
mt: (F) Timely detect the crystal quality, tail gas pressure and carbon dioxide content of the carbonation tower for alkali production, and the concentration changes of CNH3 and FNH3 of the alkali liquor, and take appropriate measures to deal with any problems found.
pe: (F) Timely detect the crystal quality, tail gas pressure and carbon dioxide content of the carbonation tower for bicarbonate producing, and the concentration changes of CNH3 and FNH3 of discharge liquor and take appropriate measures to deal with any problems found.

src: 有两种方式能够进入性能分析工具：
mt: There are two ways to access the performance analysis tool:
pe: There are two ways to access the Performance Analysis Tool:

src: （B） 经常检查进入清洗用碳化塔的氨盐水流量和清洗气流量，控制清洗用碳化塔的塔底压力和中和水（即碳化氨盐水）的二氧化碳浓度在规定的范围内。
mt: (B) Frequently check the ammonia brine flow and cleaning gas flow entering the carbonation tower for cleaning, and control the bottom pressure of the carbonation tower for cleaning and the carbon dioxide concentration of neutralization and water (i.e. ammonia carbon brine) within the specified range.
pe: (B) Frequently check the ammonia brine flow and cleaning gas flow entering the carbonation tower for cleaning, and control the bottom pressure of the carbonation tower for cleaning and the carbon dioxide concentration of neutralized liquid (i.e. carbonized ammoniated brine) within the specified range.

src: 控制制碱用碳化塔的压力稳定并保持较适宜的塔顶液位，减少塔顶排气中的二氧化碳损失。
mt: Control the pressure of the carbonization tower for alkali production to stabilize and maintain a suitable liquid level at the top of the tower to reduce the carbon dioxide loss in the exhaust gas at the top of the tower.
pe: Control the pressure of the carbonation tower for bicarbonate producing stably and keep a suitable liquid level at the top of the tower to reduce the carbon dioxide loss in the exhaust gas at the top of the tower.

src: （D） 注意检查中段气和下段气的二氧化碳浓度、压力、温度及流量。
mt: (D) Pay attention to check the carbon dioxide concentration, pressure, temperature and flow rate of the middle gas and the lower gas.
pe: (D) Pay attention to checking the carbon dioxide concentration, pressure, temperature and flow rate of the middle section gas and the lower section gas.

src: 严格控制制碱用碳化塔的中部温度和上部温度在工艺指标的控制范围内，尽量减小波动幅度。
mt: The central temperature and the upper temperature of the carbonation tower for alkali production shall be strictly controlled within the control range of process indicators to minimize the fluctuation range.
pe: The central temperature and the upper temperature of the carbonation tower for bicarbonate producing shall be strictly controlled within the control range of process indexes to minimize the fluctuation range.

src: （J） 定期对设备和管道易于产生结疤的部位进行蒸汽吹扫。
mt: (J) Steam purging shall be carried out regularly for the parts of equipment and pipelines that are easy to cause scarring.
pe: (J) Steam purging shall be carried out regularly for the parts of equipment and pipelines that are easy to generate scab.

src: 制碱作业时，流量计FI-03004需要在DCS选择制碱作业状态。
mt: During alkali production, flowmeter FI-03004 needs to select the alkali production operation state in DCS.
pe: During bicarbonate producing, flowmeter FI-03004 needs to select the bicarbonate producing operation state in DCS.

src: （A） 注意检查水平带式滤碱机（10F0301AB）的滤饼厚度及洗水分布状况，以保持滤饼的平整和洗水的分布均匀。
mt: (A) Pay attention to check the thickness of filter cake and the distribution of washing water of the horizontal belt alkali filter (10F0301AB), so as to keep the smoothness of the filter cake and the uniform distribution of washing water.
pe: (A) Pay attention to checking the thickness of filter cake and the distribution of washing water of horizontal belt filter (10F0301AB), so as to keep the smoothness of the filter cake and the uniform distribution of washing water.

src: （B） 注意水平带式滤碱机（10F0301AB）和滤过尾气洗涤塔（10T0303AB）的滤过尾气出入口的真空度的变化。
mt: (B) Pay attention to the change of vacuum degree at the inlet and outlet of the filtered tail gas of the horizontal belt alkali filter (10F0301AB) and the filtered tail gas scrubbing tower (10T0303AB).
pe: (B) Pay attention to the change of vacuum degree at the inlet and outlet of the filter tail gas of the horizontal belt filter (10F0301AB) and the filter tail gas scrubber (10T0303AB).

src: （C） 保持正常的滤布洗涤水压力，以保证水平带式滤碱机（10F0301AB）的滤布再生良好。
mt: (C) Maintain normal filter cloth washing water pressure to ensure good regeneration of filter cloth of horizontal belt alkali filter (10F0301AB).
pe: (C) Keep normal filter cloth washing water pressure to ensure good regeneration of filter cloth of horizontal belt filter (10F0301AB).

src: 1、物资管理的目的是保障公司安全运营所需物资及时（供给），提高物资使用效率，降低库存，避免因物资供应不到位给公司生产和经营带来的可能风险和经济损失。
mt: 1. The purpose of material management is to ensure the timely (supply) of materials required for safe operation of the Company, improve the use efficiency of materials, reduce inventory, and avoid possible risks and economic losses caused to the production and operation of the Company due to insufficient material supply.
pe: 1. The purposes of material management are to ensure the timely (supply) of materials required for safe operation of the Company, improve the use efficiency of materials, reduce inventory, and avoid possible risks and economic losses caused to the production and operation of the Company due to insufficient material supply.

src: 在母液蒸馏塔（10T0401）的预热段中发生的反应是氨的碳酸化合物的加热分解与二氧化碳及部分氨的解析，而其主要的目的是使二氧化碳从溶液中解析出来。
mt: The reaction occurred in the preheating section of the mother liquor distillation column (10T0401) is the heating decomposition of ammonia's carbonic acid and the analysis of carbon dioxide and part of ammonia, and the main purpose is to make carbon dioxide decompose from the solution.
pe: The reaction in the preheating section of the mother liquor distiller (10T0401) is the heating decomposition of ammonia's carbonic acid and the analysis of carbon dioxide and part of ammonia, and the main purpose is to make carbon dioxide decompose from the solution.

src: 当进入母液蒸馏塔的母液被加热到6575 C之间时，碳酸铵开始分解，分解反应随着温度的升高而加快。
mt: When the mother liquor entering the mother liquor distillation column is heated to 6575 C, the ammonium carbonate begins to decompose, and the decomposition reaction accelerates with the increase of temperature.
pe: When the mother liquor entering the mother liquor distiller is heated to 6575 C, the ammonium carbonate begins to decompose, and the decomposition reaction accelerates with the increase of temperature.

src: 当母液被加热到90 C以上时，全部的二氧化碳几乎脱除干净。
mt: When the mother liquor is heated above 90 ° C, all carbon dioxide is almost removed.
pe: When the mother liquor is heated above 90 C, all carbon dioxide is almost removed.

src: 为了使母液中的二氧化碳蒸出完全，维持适当的预热母液的温度是极为关键的。
mt: In order to make the carbon dioxide in the mother liquor completely evaporated, it is crucial to maintain the temperature of the preheating mother liquor properly.
pe: In order to make the carbon dioxide in the mother liquor completely distilled, it is crucial to maintain the temperature of the preheating mother liquor properly.

pe: Article 32 The System shall be implemented after being approved by the General Manager's Office Meeting.

mt: The method of controlling the temperature of pre-heated mother liquor is mainly to adjust the amount of steam in the mother liquor distillation column, and pay attention to whether the operating condition of the mother liquor distillation column is normal and the change of the amount of mother liquor entering the mother liquor distillation column.
pe: The method of controlling the temperature of preheating mother liquor is mainly to adjust the amount of steam in the mother liquor distiller, and pay attention to whether the operating condition of the mother liquor distiller is normal and the change of the amount of mother liquor entering the mother liquor distiller.

src: 但随着预热母液中的二氧化碳的含量的降低，能耗也将随之增加，同时维持预热母液中的二氧化碳的含量在一定的许可范围内可以起到减缓母液蒸馏塔结疤的作用。

pe: The content of carbon dioxide in the preheating mother liquor is mainly controlled by proper temperature and pressure, that is, the temperature of the preheating mother liquor and the pressure in the middle of the mother liquor distiller is kept within an appropriate range.

src: 如果在母液中加入与NH4Cl等当量的Ca(OH)2，即母液中的过剩CaO为零，当反应达到平衡时，仍然会有少量的NH4Cl不能被转化为NH4OH而被分解蒸出。
mt: If Ca (OH) 2 equivalent to NH4Cl is added into the mother liquor, i.e. the excess CaO in the mother liquor is zero, when the reaction reaches equilibrium, a small amount of NH4Cl cannot be converted into NH4OH and then decomposed and evaporated.
pe: If Ca(OH)2 equivalent to NH4Cl is added into the mother liquor, i.e. the excess CaO in the mother liquor is zero, when the reaction reaches equilibrium, a small amount of NH4Cl cannot be converted into NH4OH and then decomposed and distilled.

src: 因此，为了使化学平衡移向NH4Cl分解的正反应方向，生产中是通过加入适当过量的石灰乳的方法来使未反应的NH4Cl的含量减少至最低限度，也即是使蒸馏废液中的氨含量减至最低。
mt: Therefore, in order to move the chemical balance to the positive reaction direction of NH4Cl decomposition, the unreacted NH4Cl content is reduced to the minimum by adding an appropriate excess of lime milk in the production, i.e. the ammonia content in the distillation waste liquid is reduced to the minimum.
pe: Therefore, in order to move the chemical balance to the positive reaction direction of NH4Cl decomposition, the unreacted NH4Cl content is reduced to the minimum by adding an appropriate excess of lime milk in the production, i.e. the ammonia content in the distillation waste liquor is reduced to the minimum.

src: 废液中的过剩CaO太低，反应不完全；废液中的过剩CaO太高，则会造成灰乳的浪费，所以要将废液中的过剩CaO控制在一个适宜的范围内。
mt: The excess CaO in the waste liquid is too low and the reaction is incomplete; if the excess CaO in the waste liquid is too high, the waste of lime milk will be caused, so the excess CaO in the waste liquid shall be controlled within an appropriate range.
pe: The excess CaO in the waste liquor is too low and the reaction is incomplete; if the excess CaO in the waste liquor is too high, the waste of lime milk will be caused, so the excess CaO in the waste liquor shall be controlled within an appropriate range.

src: 由于废液中的过剩CaO的检测相对滞后，所以在生产中通常要参照预灰液的过剩CaO的指标，以便于及时调节灰乳的加入量。

pe: Since the detection of excess CaO in the waste liquor is relatively lagging, the indicators of excess CaO in the liquor after prelimer are usually referred to in the production, so as to adjust the dosage of lime milk in time.

src: 母液蒸馏塔的操作压力降低，会使蒸馏系统的气相中的氨和二氧化碳的分压降低，对它们的蒸出是有利的，但由于压力降低会使气体的密度变小，从而使蒸馏塔的气速提高，故而降低了蒸馏塔的实际生产能力，另外由于压力降低对吸收系统的氨的吸收是不利的，所以在实际生产中蒸馏塔要维持适当的操作压力。
mt: The reduction of operating pressure of mother liquor distillation column will reduce the partial pressure of ammonia and carbon dioxide in the gas phase of distillation system, which is beneficial to their evaporation. However, due to the decrease of pressure, the density of gas will be reduced, thus increasing the gas speed of distillation column, thus reducing the actual production capacity of distillation column. In addition, the reduction of pressure is unfavorable to the absorption of ammonia of absorption system, so the distillation column shall maintain appropriate operating pressure in actual production.
pe: The reduction of operating pressure of mother liquor distiller will reduce the partial pressure of ammonia and carbon dioxide in the gas phase of distillation system, which is beneficial to their distillation. However, due to the decrease of pressure, the density of gas will be reduced, thus increasing the gas speed of distiller, thus reducing the actual production capacity of distiller. In addition, the reduction of pressure is unfavorable to the absorption of ammonia of absorption system, so the distiller shall maintain appropriate operating pressure in actual production.

src: 在操作中要随时注意蒸馏塔的底部，中部和顶部的压力的变化并保持其平稳，不超标，不骤升骤降。
mt: During operation, pay attention to the pressure changes at the bottom, middle and top of the distillation column at any time and keep it stable without exceeding the standard and sudden rise and drop.
pe: During operation, pay attention to the pressure changes at the bottom, middle and top of the distiller at any time and keep it stable without exceeding the standard and sudden rise and drop.

src: 母液蒸馏塔各点的压力和压力差过大，可能的原因是负荷过高导致气速过大；或液位过高；或蒸馏塔内的结疤等杂质堵塞气、液通道, 使气、液流动受阻等。
mt: The pressure and pressure difference at each point of the mother liquor distillation column is too large, which may be caused by too high gas speed due to too high load; or too high liquid level; or impurities such as scabs in the distillation column block the gas and liquid channels, thus hindering the gas and liquid flow.
pe: The pressure and pressure difference at each point of the mother liquor distiller is too large, which may be caused by too high gas speed due to too high load; or too high liquid level; or impurities such as scabs in the distiller block the gas and liquid channels, thus hindering the gas and liquid flow.

src: 三、大客流组织
mt: Iii. Large passenger flow organization

src: 因天气原因、自然灾害、节假日或大型活动举办等情况，会造成城市轨道交通站点客流突发性的增加；同时，随着线路的增加、乘坐习惯的养成，导致车站客流曰益增加。
mt: Due to weather reasons, natural disasters, holidays or large-scale events, the passenger flow of urban rail transit stations will increase suddenly; meanwhile, with the increase of lines and the development of riding habits, the passenger flow of stations will increase day by day.
pe: Due to climate, natural disasters, holidays or large-scale events, the passenger flow of urban rail transit stations will increase suddenly; meanwhile, with the increase of lines and the development of riding habits, the passenger flow of stations will increase day by day.

src: 为做好城市轨道交通大客流组织，及时、准确应对突发情况，可以从车站级控制（以下简称“站控”）、线路级控制（以下简称“线控”）、线网级控制（以下简称“网控”)三个方面采取相关控制措施确保大客流的安全、有序。
mt: In order to organize large passenger flow of urban rail transit and deal with emergencies in a timely and accurate manner, relevant control measures can be taken from three aspects: Station-level control (hereinafter referred to as "station control"), line-level control (hereinafter referred to as "line control") and line-level control (hereinafter referred to as "network control") to ensure the safety and order of large passenger flow.
pe: In order to well organize large passenger flow of urban rail transit and deal with emergencies in a timely and accurate manner, relevant control measures can be taken from three aspects: station-level control (hereinafter referred to as "station control"), line-level control (hereinafter referred to as "line control") and network-level control (hereinafter referred to as "network control") to ensure the safety and order of large passenger flow.

src: 既然企业经营存在这样那样的风险，那么建立和健全企业经营风险管理机制就显得非常有必要，因为任何企业的经营都不可能顺风顺水。
mt: Since there is such a risk in enterprise operation, it is very necessary to establish and improve the enterprise operation risk management mechanism, because the operation of any enterprise cannot be carried out
pe: Since there are risks in enterprise business because no business can always operate smoothly, it is very necessary to establish and improve the enterprise business risk management mechanism.

src: 企业在进行经营风险管理时，一般会坚持以下几项原则:
mt: Enterprises generally adhere to the following principles when conducting business risk management:
pe: For business risk management, enterprises generally adhere to the following principles:

src: 企业经营风险具有客观性，在分析风险时要尽量客观、全面。
mt: The enterprise's business risks are objective, and the risks shall be analyzed as objective and comprehensive as possible.
pe: The enterprise's business risks are objective, so the risks shall be objectively and comprehensively analyzed as possible.

src: 对风险事件、风险损益不能—厢情愿、过于乐观，决不能在信息不全面、缺乏统计分析、对风险茫然无知的情况下，对获利做过高估计，对损失做过小评价。
mt: Risk events and risk gains and losses cannot be - willing and too optimistic. Under the circumstance of incomplete information, lack of statistical analysis and ignorance of risks, the profit can be overestimated and the loss can be evaluated too small.
pe: Risk events and risk gains and losses cannot be wishful-thinking and too optimistic. Under the circumstance of incomplete information, lack of statistical analysis and ignorance of risks, the profit can not be overestimated and the loss can not be underestimated.

src: 对待风险需要谨慎从事°认真考虑潜在损害发生的机会、规模，研究得失关系。
mt: The risk treatment needs to be carried out carefully. The opportunity and scale of potential damage shall be carefully considered to study the relationship between gains and losses.
pe: The risk needs to be handled carefully. The opportunity and scale of potential damage shall be carefully considered to study the relationship between gains and losses.

src: 要认清风险处理后是否会带来更大风险，特别是在后期会否给企业带来难以避免的风险、造成更大的损失。
mt: It is necessary to identify whether the risk treatment will bring more risks, especially if it will bring unavoidable risks and greater losses to the enterprise in the later period.
pe: It is necessary to identify whether the risk treatment will cause more risks, especially if it will cause unavoidable risks and greater losses to the enterprise in the later period.

src: 经营风险管理的根本要求是以最小的风险成本投人获得最大的安全保障。
mt: The fundamental requirement of operational risk management is to maximize the safety guarantee by investing the minimum risk cost.
pe: The fundamental requirement of business risk management is to maximize the safety guarantee with the minimum risk cost.

src: 另外，企业在控制经营风险的时候，—定要学会基本的风险应对策略，通常情况下，应对企业经营风险有5种策略:
mt: In addition, when controlling business risks, enterprises must learn basic risk response strategies. Generally, there are 5 strategies to deal with business risks:
pe: In addition, when controlling the business risk, the enterprise must learn basic risk response strategies. Generally, there are 5 strategies to deal with business risks:

src: 企业可以通过与供应商、经销商形成战略联盟，共同抵御和回避面临的风险。
mt: Enterprises can jointly resist and avoid risks by forming strategic alliances with suppliers and distributors.
pe: The enterprise can jointly resist and avoid risks by forming strategic alliances with suppliers and distributors.

src: 对于无法转嫁又无法回避的经营风险，可采用积极的预防性措施，降低风险发生的可能性或减少发生后的损失。
mt: For business risks that cannot be transferred and cannot be avoided, positive preventive measures can be taken to reduce the possibility of risk occurrence or reduce the loss after occurrence.
pe: For business risks that cannot be transferred and cannot be avoided, positive preventive measures can be taken to decrease the possibility of risk or reduce the loss after the occurrence.

src: 如对低赊销中的坏账风险，可加强对赊账客户的管理，对客户的信用进行调查和甄别，对应收账的账龄进行分析，建立赊销责任制度等。
mt: For example, for bad debt risk in low credit sales, the management of credit customers can be strengthened, the credit of customers can be investigated and screened, the aging of accounts receivable can be analyzed, and the credit sales liability system can be established.
pe: For the bad debt risk in low credit sales, the management of credit customers can be strengthened, the credit of customers can be investigated and screened, the aging of accounts receivable can be analyzed, and the credit sales liability system can be established.

src: 如为降低长期投资项目的投资风险,可采用合资、合伙或股份化的组织形式来筹资组建。
mt: In order to reduce the investment risk of long-term investment projects, the form of joint venture, partnership or joint-stock organization can be adopted for financing and formation.
pe: In order to reduce the investment risk of long-term investment projects, the form of a joint venture, partnership or joint-stock organization can be adopted for financing and formation.

src: 2.车站值班员本着“先通后复”的原则，通知站台人员及时“旁路”屏蔽门，并通知站台人员确认车门关闭良好，无夹人夹物，显示关门手信号。
mt: 2. Based on the principle of "opening first and then resuming," the station attendant shall notify the platform personnel to "bypass" the screen door in time, and notify the platform personnel to confirm that the door is closed well without people and objects caught, and display the door closing hand signal.
pe: 2. Based on the principle of "operation resumption first, fault recovery later," the station attendant shall notify the platform personnel to "bypass" the screen door in time, and notify the platform personnel to confirm that the door is closed well without people and objects caught, and display the door closing hand signal.

src: 4.车站值班员接站务员屏蔽门故障处理完毕，及时报行调。
mt: 4. The station attendant shall report to the traffic dispatcher in time after the fault handling of the PSD of the station attendant is completed.
pe: 4. The station attendant shall report to the traffic dispatcher in time after the completion of the fault handling of the PSD is reported by the station attendant.

src: 5.屏蔽门维修一律按影响行车的施工办理，必须上报行调，维修时通知站台站务员配合处理，维修完毕汇报行调。
mt: 5. Psd maintenance shall be handled according to the construction affecting train operation, and must be reported to the traffic dispatcher. During maintenance, the station operator shall be notified to cooperate with the handling, and the traffic dispatcher shall be reported after maintenance.
pe: 5. PSD maintenance shall be handled according to the construction affecting train operation, and must be reported to the traffic dispatcher. During maintenance, the station operator at the platform shall be notified to cooperate with the handling, and the traffic dispatcher shall be reported after maintenance.

src: 6.告知维修人员，维修完毕后，不得操作PSL做整侧屏蔽门开关测试，应利用列车导致联动开关屏蔽门，观测做出修复与否的判断，若需利用行车间隔做屏蔽门开关测试必须得到行调同意。
mt: 6. Inform the maintenance personnel that after the maintenance is completed, the PSL shall not be operated to conduct the whole-side PSD switch test. The train shall be used to cause the linkage switch of the PSD, and the judgment of whether to repair or not shall be observed. If the train operation interval needs to be used for PSD switch test, the traffic dispatcher approved it.
pe: 6. Inform the maintenance personnel that after the maintenance is completed, the PSL shall not be operated to conduct the whole-side PSD switch test. The train shall be used to cause the linkage switch of the PSD, and the judgment of whether to repair or not made according to the observed result. If the train operation interval needs to be used for PSD switch test, the traffic dispatcher shall be reported for approval.

src: 1.行调接报屏蔽门故障后，需及时通知相关车站，同时通知驾驶员“××站××站台××号（××对或所有）屏蔽门不能开启（关闭），进入该车站驾驶员加强瞭望，注意安全”。

After receiving and reporting the failure of the screen door, the traffic dispatcher shall notify the relevant stations in time, and notify the driver that "No. Xx (XX pair or all) screen doors at XX station cannot be opened (closed), the drivers entering the station shall strengthen observation and pay attention to safety."
pe: 1. After receiving the failure report of the screen door, the traffic dispatcher shall notify the relevant stations in time, and notify the driver that "No. Xx (XX pair or all) screen doors at XX station cannot be opened (closed), and the drivers entering the station shall strengthen observation and pay attention to safety."

src: 7.3.11.2主油泵为齿轮泵，主油泵送出的压力油经油冷器管束和油滤器进入机体主油道，分配给各主轴承，然后经曲轴内的油道进入连杆轴承，再经连杆油孔进入十字头衬套，最后经十字头油孔被压送到十字头摩擦表面。
mt: 7.3.11.2the main oil pump is a gear pump. The pressure oil from the main oil pump enters the main oil passage of the engine body through the oil cooler tube bundle and the oil filter, and is distributed to each main bearing. Then, it enters the connecting rod bearing through the oil passage in the crankshaft, and then enters the crosshead bushing through the connecting rod oil hole. Finally, it is pressed to the crosshead friction surface through the crosshead oil hole.
pe: 7.3.11.2 The main oil pump is a gear pump. The pressure oil from the main oil pump enters the main oil passage of the body through the oil cooler tube bundle and the oil filter and is distributed to each main bearing. Then, it enters the connecting rod bearing through the oil passage in the crankshaft, and then enters the crosshead bushing through the connecting rod oil hole. Finally, it is pressed to the crosshead friction surface through the crosshead oil hole.

src: 对于水中承台的施工，应根据水文情况，采用钢板桩+内撑+斜撑的支护方式，基坑开挖采用机械设备为主。

pe: For the construction of pile cap in water, the support mode of steel sheet pile + inner bracing + diagonal bracing shall be adopted according to the hydrological conditions, and the foundation pit excavation shall be mainly carried out by mechanical equipment.

src: 承台坑底四周挖0.3m宽0.3m深排水沟，并在基坑对角处挖0.5m×0.5m×0.5m集水坑，潜水泵抽水，明排水作业，保证基底土质干燥无积水。
mt: A 0.3m-wide 0.3m-deep drainage ditch shall be excavated around the bottom of the bearing platform pit, and a 0.5mX0.5mX0.5m sump shall be excavated at the opposite corners of the foundation pit. Submersible pumps shall be used for pumping water and open drainage operation shall be carried out to ensure that the soil at the base is dry and free of accumulated water.
pe: A 0.3m-wide 0.3m-deep drainage ditch shall be excavated around the bottom of the pile cap foundation pit, and a 0.5mx0.5mx0.5m sump shall be excavated at the opposite corner of the foundation pit. Submersible pumps shall be used for pumping water and open drainage operation shall be carried out to ensure that the soil at the base is dry and free of accumulated water.

src: 开挖时及时安装支撑，支撑采用型钢支撑，防止由于周围土压，使基坑围护结构收缩，导致塌方地面沉降等，危及基坑安全。
mt: During excavation, supports shall be installed in time. Profile steel supports shall be used to prevent the foundation pit enclosure structure from shrinking due to the surrounding soil pressure, resulting in the settlement of the collapsed ground and endangering the safety of the foundation pit.
pe: During excavation, supports shall be installed in time. Section steel supports shall be used to prevent the foundation pit enclosure structure from shrinking due to the surrounding soil pressure, resulting in the settlement of the collapsed ground and endangering the safety of the foundation pit.

mt: After the formwork is removed according to the specified time, the concrete surface shall be repaired and eliminated within 48 hours to eliminate joint marks or bubbles on the concrete surface.
pe: After the formwork is removed within the specified time, the concrete surface shall be repaired within 48 hours to eliminate joint marks or surface bubbles.

pe: A certain amount of admixture can be mixed into concrete to increase the smoothness of concrete surface and reduce bubbles.

pe: During the pouring, the unloading height of concrete shall not exceed 2m. If the height exceeds 2m, tremie-type tumbling barrel shall be used.

src: 气候变化对经济长期增长也会产生负面影响，若每年气温高于历史标准值0.01摄氏度，实际人均GDP会下降0.059个百分点。

When multiple groups of isolating switches are installed in parallel, it shall be ensured that all base installation surfaces are on the same horizontal plane and the spacing between bases meets the design requirements.
pe: When the disconnector base is installed, ensure that the installation surfaces of the two bases are horizontal and the spacing meets the design requirements. When multiple groups of disconnectors are installed in parallel, ensure that all base installation surfaces are on the same horizontal plane and the spacing between bases meets the design requirements.

pe: Measure the stagger and wire height of the two contact suspensions at the turnout location, and compare the data given in the design.

pe: When the operator gets on the ladder trolley, the ground personnel push the ladder trolley to the location. The operator on the trolley shall mark the registration tube according to the quantity provided by the technician and adjust it in place.

pe: Measure the projection position at the intersection of the two contact suspensions to see whether it can meet the design requirements.

src: 梯车移至定位点两侧吊弦处，通过调整吊的有效长度调节道岔处工作支与非支的高度，使之满足设计要求。

pe: Move the ladder trolley to the droppers on both sides of the location point, and adjust the height of the working support and the non-working support at the turnout by adjusting the effective length of the dropper to meet the design requirements.

pe: After the two contact suspensions are adjusted in place, calculate the offset of the contact wire under the overhead crossing according to the temperature during installation and the installation curve.

src: 以线岔管中心点为准，将偏移量值标在线制管上。

pe: Mark the offset value on the wire pipe fabrication based on the center point of the overhead-crossing pipe.

pe: Check the stagger of the two contact suspensions at the overhead crossing, the position of the intersection, the height difference between the two contact wires at the initial contact, etc., and make records.

src: 工程选线应尽量绕避生态敏感区，尽量保持沿线生态系统的完整性、地域的连续性和物种多样性及生物组成的协调性，应尽可能绕避城镇建成区和规划区；贯彻保护耕地，减小占用良田耕地，减缓对敏感区域的影响。
mt: The route selection of the Project shall avoid ecologically sensitive areas as far as possible, maintain the integrity of the ecosystem, regional continuity, species diversity and coordination of biological composition along the line as far as possible, and bypass urban built-up areas and planning areas as far as possible; implement the protection of cultivated land, reduce the occupation of fertile farmland and reduce the impact on sensitive areas.
pe: The route selection of the Project shall try to avoid ecologically sensitive areas, maintain the integrity of the ecosystem, regional continuity, species diversity and coordination of biological composition along the line as far as possible, and bypass urban built-up areas and planning areas as far as possible; implement the protection of cultivated land, reduce the occupation of fertile farmland and reduce the impact on sensitive areas.

mt: The section from Calaguag to Lupi runs along the coastline of Ragay Gulf. The northeast of the line is Labo Volcano, and the southwest is Lagai Bay. The terrain is high in the north and low in the south.
pe: The section from Calaguag to Lupi runs along the coastline of Ragay Gulf. The northeast of the line is Labo Volcano, and the southwest is Ragay Gulf. The terrain is high in the north and low in the south.

src: Lupi至Legazpi段位于比科尔平原，沿线地势较为平坦，比科尔平原呈北西-南东走向，东部为一连串的火山（如Isarog火山、Malinao火山、Iriga火山、Masagara火山和Mayon火山），西部边界为高地和低山丘陵。
mt: The Lupi-Legazpi section is located in the Bicol Plain. The terrain along the line is relatively flat. The Bicol Plain runs in a NW-SE direction. In the east, there is a series of volcanoes (such as Isarog volcano, Malinao volcano, Iriga volcano, Masagara volcano and Mayon volcano). The western boundary is highland and low mountains and hills.
pe: The Lupi-Legazpi section is located in the Bicol Plain. The terrain along the line is relatively flat. The Bicol Plain runs in a NW-SE direction. In the east, there is a series of volcanoes (such as Isarog volcano, Malinao volcano, Iriga volcano, Masagara volcano and Mayon volcano). The western boundary is highland and low mountains and hills.

pe: Considering the repeated COVID-19 pandemic, epidemic prevention still cannot be slackened.

src: 上部覆盖层主要为全新世冲、洪积、海积形成的粉质粘土、粉土、沙土及砾卵石、漂石，沿线水田、沼泽地、河流阶地、漫滩以及山间冲沟等低洼处分布有有厚度不等的软土及松软土，同时在火山附近分布有不同厚度的火山灰。
mt: The upper overburden is mainly composed of silty clay, silt, sandy soil, gravel pebbles and boulders formed by Holocene alluvial, proluvial and marine deposits. Soft soil and mollisol with different thickness are distributed in low-lying areas such as paddy fields, swamps, river terraces, floodplains and intermountain gullies along the line, and volcanic ash with different thickness is distributed near the volcano.
pe: The upper overburden mainly consists of silty clay, silt, sandy soil, gravel pebbles and boulders formed by Holocene alluvial, proluvial and marine deposits. Soft soil and mollisol with different thickness are distributed in low-lying areas such as paddy fields, swamps, river terraces, floodplains and intermontane gullies along the line, and volcanic ash with different thickness is distributed near the volcano.

src: 在目前的垃圾发电厂中，风机和水泵是主要的耗能设备，通常情况下其输入能量的15～20%被电机和风机或水泵本身所消耗，约35～50%的输入能量被挡板或阀门节流所消耗。
mt: In the current waste power plant, fans and water pumps are the main energy consumption equipment. Generally, 15 ~ 20% of the input energy is consumed by the motor, fans or water pumps, and about 35 ~ 50% of the input energy is consumed by baffles or valves.
pe: In the current garbage power plant, blowers and water pumps are the main energy consumption equipment. Generally, 15 ~ 20% of the input energy is consumed by the motor, blowers or water pumps, and about 35 ~ 50% of the input energy is consumed by baffles or valves.

pe: High-efficiency energy-saving lamps are selected in the lighting design, and a large number of LED lamps are used. src: 通过逻辑运算和判断，当某一运行状态对设备和人身产生危险时发出主燃料跳闸（MFT）信号，同时利用各种连锁和顺控装置使燃烧系统中的有关设备严格按照一定的逻辑顺序进行操作和处理，以保证锅炉系统和人员的安全。
mt: Through logic calculation and judgment, when a certain operating state is dangerous to equipment and personnel, the main fuel trip (MFT) signal is sent out, and various interlocking and sequential control devices are used to make relevant equipment in the combustion system operate and process in strict accordance with a certain logical sequence to ensure the safety of boiler system and personnel.

src: 设计联络主要工作内容
mt: Main work contents of design liaison
pe: Main Work Contents of Design Liaison

src: （1） 第一次联络会议：设计交底，双方互提基础资料，确认系统和设备功能和技术参数。
mt: (1) The first liaison meeting: Design disclosure; both parties provide basic data to each other to confirm the functions and technical parameters of the system and equipment.
pe: (1) First liaison meeting: Design disclosure; both parties provide basic data to each other to confirm the functions and technical parameters of the system and equipment.

src: （2） 第二次联络会议：审核图纸，讨论、确认技术方案及接口方案，问题澄清。
mt: (2) Second liaison meeting: Review the drawings, discuss and confirm the technical scheme and interface scheme, and clarify the problems.
pe: (2) Second liaison meeting: Review drawings; discuss and confirm the technical proposal and interface scheme; clarify questions.

src: 联络地点

pe: Liaison Places

pe: (1) The first design liaison is conducted at the Employer's.

src: （2） 第二次联络在主要设备（含关键元器件）原产地（含国外）。
mt: (2) The second contact is made at the origin (including foreign countries) of main equipment (including key components).
pe: (2) The second design liaison is conducted at the origin (including foreign countries) of main equipment (including key components).

src: （3） 第三次设计联络在设备厂家。

pe: (3) The third design liaison is conducted at the equipment manufacturers'.

mt: The Project Department shall take this schedule as the target, formulate practical, reasonable and careful construction operation plan and resource supporting plan in stages, months and ten days, and strictly implement it.
pe: The Project Department shall take this schedule as the target, stipulate practical, reasonable and careful construction operation plan and resource supporting plan in stages, months and ten days, and strictly implement them.

src: （1）在计划执行过程中，如果出现进度延迟，首先进一步分析进度延迟对进度控制目标的影响程度及其产生的原因，对各工序间施工进行调整，制定出追回工期的措施。
mt: (1) During the implementation of the plan, in case of schedule delay, the impact of schedule delay on schedule control objectives and the causes thereof shall be further analyzed, the construction between each process shall be adjusted, and measures for recovery of construction period shall be formulated.
pe: (1) During the implementation of the plan, in case of schedule delay, the impact of schedule delay on schedule control objectives and the causes thereof shall be further analyzed, the construction between each process shall be adjusted, and measures for recovery of construction period shall be stipulated.

src: （2）做好关键工序工期与计划进度吻合，保证关键工序、节点工期与计划进度的一致性。
mt: (2) The construction period of key processes shall be consistent with the planned progress to ensure the consistency between the construction period of key processes and nodes and the planned progress.
pe: (2) The construction period of key processes shall be consistent with the planned schedule to ensure the consistency between the construction period of key processes and nodes and the planned schedule.

src: 机械设备、周转材料和劳动力是工程施工主要的生产要素，其中沥青搅拌站在施工准备阶段进行安装并投入使用，提高施工效率，加快施工进度；周转材料、劳动力将按照需用计划的要求，及时组织进场。
mt: Mechanical equipment, revolving materials and labor force are the main production factors of the project construction. The asphalt mixing station is installed and put into use in the construction preparation stage to improve the construction efficiency and speed up the construction progress. Revolving materials and labor force will be mobilized in time according to the requirements of the demand plan.
pe: Mechanical equipment, revolving materials and labor force are the main production factors of the project construction. The asphalt batching plant is installed and put into service in the construction preparation stage to improve the construction efficiency and speed up the construction progress; revolving materials and labor force will be mobilized in time according to the requirements of the demand plan.

src: 在这方面我公司历来非常重视，并积累了十分成熟的经验，在施工过程中，外界影响生产的因素很多，我公司将调协专门的负责人，加强对当地行政机构和单位的协调，取得当地行政机构的支持，为保证施工生产的正常进行，创造良好的外部环境。
mt: In this regard, our company has always attached great importance to it and accumulated very mature experience. During the construction process, there are many factors affecting the production from the outside world. Our company will coordinate with the special person in charge to strengthen the coordination of local administrative organizations and units and obtain the support of local administrative organizations to ensure the normal construction and production and create a good external environment.
pe: In this regard, our company has always attached great importance to it and accumulated very mature experience. During construction, there are many external factors affecting production. src: 1.工程开工前，根据业主提供的平面控制点进行平面控制网联测，控制等级必须符英国标准BS 5964:Part 1: 1990ISO 4463-1:1989及设计要求。

Before the commencement of the project, the joint survey of the horizontal control network shall be carried out according to the horizontal control points provided by the Employer, and the control level must conform to the British Standard BS 5964: Part 1: 1990iso 4463-1: 1989 and the design requirements.
pe: 1. Before the commencement of the project, the joint survey of the horizontal control network shall be carried out according to the horizontal control points provided by the Employer, and the control level must conform to BS 5964: Part 1: 1990ISO 4463-1:1989 and design requirements.

pe: In view of the flat terrain of the construction site, the joint survey of horizontal control points is also used as elevation control points in the vertical net.

If it does not meet the requirements, please inject lubricating oil of the type specified in the drawing (or in the technical agreement) to make the oil level within the specified range, that is, the oil level displayed in the oil sight glass is between the upper and lower limits.
pe: Check whether the oil level is within the specified range through the oil level sight glass. If it fails to meet the requirements, please inject lubricating oil of the type specified in the drawing (or in the technical agreement) to make the oil level within the specified range, namely, the oil level displayed in the oil level sight glass is between the upper and lower limits.

src: 点动空压机（最多2s），检查旋转方向，电机旋转方向应与电机转向标识一致；若不一致，立即停机，检查电路连接。
mt: Inch the air compressor (2s at most) and check the rotation direction. The rotation direction of the motor shall be consistent with the rotation direction mark of the motor. If not, stop the machine immediately and check the circuit connection.
pe: Inch the air compressor (2s at most) and check the rotation direction. The rotation direction of the motor shall be consistent with the motor steering mark; if not, stop immediately and check the circuit connection.

src: 根据国家和行业规范，深化初步设计内容，达到工程施工的要求。

mt: The operation time of the air supply unit under rated and overpressure conditions shall be ≥min, and the tightness of its oil and gas pipelines shall be checked.
pe: The operation time of the air supply unit under rated and overpressure conditions shall be greater than or equal to 20min, and the tightness of its oil and gas pipelines shall be checked.

src: 空压机运行时，检查油路接头、机头端盖、螺堵等部位是否出现漏油、渗油等现象；并用检漏液检查各气路接口是否漏气，如下所示；若出现泄漏应立即采取措施，防止泄漏，然后重新试验。
mt: When the air compressor is running, check whether there is oil leakage or oil leakage at the oil circuit joint, head end cover, screw plug and other parts; check whether there is air leakage at each air circuit interface with leak detection fluid, as shown below; if there is leakage, take measures immediately to prevent leakage, and then retest.
pe: When the air compressor is running, check whether there is oil leakage or seepage at the oil circuit joint, head end shield, screw plug and other parts; check whether there is air leakage at each air circuit interface with leak detection fluid, as shown below; take measures immediately to prevent leakage in case of any leakage, and then retest.

src: 高压泵管因压力很高，混凝土对泵管内壁会产生很大的摩擦力，因此需定期采用超声波检测泵管厚度，特别是首层水平段弯管。
mt: Due to the high pressure of the high-pressure pump pipe, the concrete will produce a great friction on the inner wall of the pump pipe, so the thickness of the pump pipe needs to be regularly detected by ultrasonic wave, especially the elbow at the horizontal section of the first floor.
pe: Due to the high pressure of the high-pressure pump pipe, the concrete will produce a great friction on the inner wall of the pump pipe, so the thickness of the pump pipe needs to be regularly checked by ultrasonic testing, especially the bend at the horizontal section of the first floor.

src: 以园中的景物对应四季，春天是一径时而苍白时而黑润的小路，时而明朗时而阴晦的天上摇荡着串串扬花；夏天是一条条耀眼而灼人的石凳，或阴凉而爬满了青苔的石阶，阶下有果皮，阶上有半张被坐皱的报纸；秋天是一座青铜的大钟，在园子的西北角上曾丢弃着一座很大的铜钟，铜钟与这园子一般年纪，浑身挂满绿锈，文字已不清晰；冬天，是林中空地上几只羽毛蓬松的老麻雀。
mt: The sceneries in the garden correspond to the four seasons. Spring is a path of pale and dark paths, while bright and dark sky shakes with flowers; summer is a bright and burning stone stool, or a cool and mossy stone step, with fruit skin on the step, and half of the wrinkled newspaper on the step; autumn is a bronze big bell. A large copper bell was discarded at the northwest corner of the garden. The copper bell and the garden are ordinary years old, with green rust on the whole body and unclear text; in winter, it is an old sparrow with several fluffy feathers on the hollow forest.

src: 如项目中标，我方将成立乘客信息系统项目组，包括项目组负责人、项目组总工、项目组各部门、各施工作业队，负责项目的对内实施管理、对外协调工作，充分发挥我方地铁施工的物质优势和人才优势，充分调动所有可利用的优质资源，以参加多年轨道交通乘客信息系统安装工程经验的项目管理人员和实施人员为主体，组建精练、高效的弱电系统施工项目部。
mt: If we win the bid, we will set up a passenger information system project team, including the project team leader, the chief engineer of the project team, all departments of the project team and all construction teams, to be responsible for the internal implementation management and external coordination of the project, give full play to the material advantages and talent advantages of our metro construction, fully mobilize all available high-quality resources, and set up a lean and efficient weak current system construction project department with the project management personnel and implementation personnel who have participated in the installation of rail transit passenger information system for many years.
pe: If we win the bid, we will set up a passenger information system project team, including the project team leader, the chief engineer of the project team, all departments of the project team and all construction teams, to be responsible for the internal implementation management and external coordination of the project, give full play to the material advantages and talent advantages of our metro construction, fully mobilize all available high-quality resources, and set up a lean and efficient light current system construction project department with the project management personnel and implementation personnel who have participated in the installation of rail transit passenger information system for many years.

src: 同时，我方还将根据乘客信息系统设备安装工程的具体情况和工期要求，组建年轻化、知识化、专业化、富有乘客信息系统设备安装、调试经验的安装、调试队伍，根据系统特点，划分成若干专业施工小组，各负其责，共同完成线缆敷设、桥架安装、托架安装、测试以及系统设备的安装、调试工作。
mt: At the same time, we will also set up a young, knowledgeable, professional and experienced installation and commissioning team for passenger information system equipment according to the specific conditions and construction period requirements of passenger information system equipment installation works. According to the system characteristics, we will divide it into several professional construction teams, each of which will take its own responsibility to jointly complete the cable laying, cable tray installation, bracket installation, testing and installation and commissioning of system equipment.
pe: Meanwhile, we will also set up a young, knowledgeable, professional and experienced installation and commissioning team for passenger information system equipment according to the specific conditions and construction period requirements of passenger information system equipment installation works. According to the system characteristics, we will divide it into several discipline construction teams, each of which will take its own responsibility to jointly complete the cable laying, cable tray installation, bracket installation, testing and installation and commissioning of system equipment.

src: 苏州光电缆工艺研究所（简称：工艺所），是中国铁路通信信号上海工程局集团有限公司在苏州的分支企业，是集科研、生产、培训为一体的专业研究机构。
mt: Suzhou Optical Cable Technology Research Institute (hereinafter referred to as "the Technology Institute") is a branch enterprise of China Railway Signal & Communication Shanghai Engineering Group Co., Ltd. in Suzhou and a professional research institution integrating scientific research, production and training.
pe: Suzhou Optical Power Cable Technology Research Institute (hereinafter referred to as "the Technology Institute") is a branch enterprise of China Railway Signal & Communication Shanghai Engineering Bureau Group Co., Ltd. in Suzhou and a professional research institution integrating scientific research, production, and training.

src: 根据乘客信息系统工程专业特点，施工主要划分为7个阶段：现场预留预埋、漏缆支架安装、桥架管线安装、各类支吊架安装、线敷设及成端、设备安装、系统调试。
mt: According to the characteristics of passenger information system engineering discipline, the construction is mainly divided into stages: On-site reservation and embedding, installation of leaky cable support, installation of bridge and pipeline, installation of various supports and hangers, laying and termination of wires, equipment installation and system commissioning.
pe: According to the characteristics of passenger information system engineering discipline, the construction is mainly divided into seven stages: On-site reservation and embedding, installation of leaky cable support, installation of cable tray and pipeline, installation of various supports and hangers, laying and termination of wires, equipment installation and system commissioning.
